SA15n1236:2: tadevaṃ karyahetau yato yabhdavadṛṣṭaṃ sakṛt pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ tādṛśasya sarvvasya tathāvidhādeva janma na tadvijātīyadityekasyā api kāryavyakteḥ kutaścid bhāvadarśane vyāptyā'nvayavyatirekasiddhiriti pratipāditam |
SA15n1236:6: apare tu pratiṣedhyaviṣayajñānarūpeṇāpariṇāmamātmanaḥ tadanyavastuviṣayaṃ vijñānameva vā'bhāvasya gamakaṃ pratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ pramāṇāntaramāhurmmīmāṃsakāḥ |
SA15n1236:10: abhāvāṃśe tu nāstīti jñānaṃ janayat tadabhāvapramāṇākhyāṃ labhate,
SA15n1236:14: naiyāyikāstu nāstīti jñānameva kevalapradeśādigrāhijñānantarabhāvipratyakṣaṃ na pramāṇāntaramabhāvasya tuccharūpasya paricchedātmakamācakṣate tadevāsya ghaṭādeḥ pratiṣedhyasyānupalabdhiśabdena yadyucyate na kaścidvirodhaḥ iti |
SA15n1236:15: tadevamanupalabdhau bhedaṃ gatā buddhayaḥ prativādināmiti tannirāsārthamanupalabdhisvarūpaṃ tāvadupadarśayannāha-“upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya” ityādi |
SA15n1236:18: yaḥ svabhāvaḥ satsvanyeṣūpalambhapratyayeṣu san pratyakṣa eva bhavatī’tyevaṃrūpā śāstrakṛtā'nyatra vyākhyātā naiyāyikavipratipattinirāsārtham |
SA15n1236:24: yadāha bhāṣyakāraḥ-‘nānumānata upalabhyamānasya pratyakṣato'nupalabdhirabhāve hetuḥ’ iti |
SA15n1236:25: indriyatvāt tvagādivat kila prāpyakāri cakṣurityanumānataścākṣuṣo raśmirupalabhyate tasya pratyakṣato'nupalabdhiḥ kathamabhāvavyavahāraṃ sādhayet ? iti |
SA15n1236:27: yadā hyupalambhapratyayāntarasākalyaṃ svabhāvaviśeṣaśca yathokta upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptirucyate na mahattvādikaṃ tadā kuto vyabhicārāvakāśaḥ ?
SA15n1236:30: nahi rūpādivyatiriktaṃ dravyaṃ tatpratibhāsavivekinā''kārāntareṇa svajñāne pratibhāsate |
SA15n1236:35: tato na mahattvaṃ dravyasyopalambhakaṃ rūpaṃ vā |
SA15n1236:38: na ca mahattvaṃ rūpaṃ vā dravyodayakāle'bhyupagamyate,
SA15n1236:40: tacca pratilabdhātmakameva tathātāmanubhavatīti prathame kṣaṇe dravyaṃ nirguṇameva |
SA15n1236:41: na cāsya dvitīye kṣaṇe prāktanarūpatyāgo'sti rūpāntaraṃ vā''virbhavati yataḥ prāgapratipannādhārabhāvaṃ mahattvādiguṇapratibandhādādhāratāṃ yāyāt |
SA15n1236:46: , yataḥ svotkalitaṃ kāryaṃ janayat tathā vyapadiśyate |
SA15n1236:47: na caitat kṣaṇikatve sambhavati akṣaṇikatve vā prāga'nādhārasya paścādādhārābhāvaḥ |
SA15n1236:48: samavāyikāraṇāsambhavādevānekadravyavattvamapyasmabhavi yasmādanekaṃ dravyamārambhakaṃ samavāyikāraṇātmanā yasya vidyate tadevaṃ vyapadiśyate |
SA15n1236:52: tā na tayopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdhirasavdyavahārasiddhāvanaikāntikīti śāstrakāro darśayāmbabhūva “upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya” yā “anupalabdhiḥ” kāraṇasya vyāpakasya vā pratiṣedhyādanyasya sā “abhāvahetuḥ” kāryasya vyāpyasya ca “abhāvavyavahārahetuśca” |
SA15n1236:54: yā tvanupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdhiḥ pratyakṣānumānanivṛttilakṣaṇā sā saṃśayahetuḥ pramāṇanivṛttāvapyarthābhāvāsiddheḥ,
SA15n1236:59: tannirāsārthaṃ jñātṛ-jñeyadharmalakṣaṇāmanupalabdhiṃ darśayitumupalabdhimeva tāvaddvividhāmdarśayannāha- “atra” anupalabdhivākye yopalabdhiḥ śrūyate kriyārūpā sā yadā kartṛsthatayā'pekṣyate tadā tasyā “upalabhamānasya” katuḥ “dharmmatve” apekṣyamāṇe “tajjñānam” upalabhamānasya yajjñānaṃ tad upalabdhirucyate |
SA15n1236:60: upalabhamānaśca buddhīndriyadehakalāpa eva ca pūrvvakṣaṇasaṅgṛhīta upalabdhijanaka ucyate |
SA15n1236:62: na cendriyāderanyasya janakatvaṃ sambhavati yato'nvayavyatirekanibandhanaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvavyavahāraḥ,
SA15n1236:63: tau cānvayavyatirekau nendriyāderanyasya sambhavataḥ satsvindriyādiṣu niyamenopalabdherbhāvāt |
SA15n1236:64: yadi hīndriyādiṣu satsvapi kadācidupalabdhirnopajāyate tadā satsvapyanyeṣu sakaleṣu hetuṣu kāryānutpattiḥ kāraṇāntaravaikalyaṃ sūcayatīti tavdyatiriktakāraṇāntaraṃ parikalpyeta |
SA15n1236:73: tathāhi-upalabdheravināśa eva sthitirucyate na pātābhāvaḥ tasyā gurutvābhāvāt “saṃyogābhāvena gurutvāt patanam” iti ca pareṣāṃ kṛtāntaḥ |
SA15n1236:87: yathā bhakṣyābhakṣyaprakaraṇe vivakṣitād bhakṣyādanyatvād ‘abhakṣyo grāmyakukkuṭaḥ’ bhakṣyo'pi san tadanyasya-ucyate |
SA15n1236:88: yathā ca sparśanīyāsparśanīyādhikāre vivakṣitāt sparśanīyādanyatvād ‘asparśanīyaścāṇḍālādiḥ’-tadanyasya sparśanīyo'pi san-ucyate |
SA15n1236:92: paryudāsena pratiṣedhyasyārthasya rvajanena yā viśiṣṭe'rthe vṛttistayā ,
SA15n1236:94: yatra vidheḥ prādhānyaṃ pratiṣedho'rthagṛhītaḥ vidhibhāksvapadena nocyate ekavākyatā ca tatra paryudāsavṛttitā |
SA15n1236:95: vidheśca prādhānyaṃ ‘vivakṣitopalabdheranyopalabdhirbhavati’ ityevaṃ vākyenānyopalabdhervvidhānāt anyopalabdhisāmarthyādeva vivakṣitopalabdheḥ pratiṣedhaḥ pratīyate |
SA15n1236:96: vivakṣitopalabdheranivarttane tadapekṣayā'nyasyā vidhānāyogāt svapadena nañā vidhibhāṅ nocyate |
SA15n1236:98: anyaśabdena paryudāsāśraye-ṇā'nyaśabdasyaiva vākye prayogāt anyā upalabdhiranupalabdhiriti |
SA15n1236:99: nañaśca subantena sāmarthyaṃ na tiṅantena ityekavākyatvaṃ ‘na upalabdhiranupalabdhiḥ’ iti |
SA15n1236:101: tatra hi pratiṣedhasya prādhānyaṃ vidhirarthād gamyate vākyabhedaḥ svapadena nañā pratiṣedhabhāk sambadhyate |
SA15n1236:103: yadā karmmasthakriyāpekṣayopalabhyamānasya vastuno dharmma upalabdhirvvivakṣyate tadā viṣayasvabhāva upalabdhirmantavyā |
SA15n1236:106: pratiṣedhyasya ghaṭāderyadātmaviṣayaṃ vijñānaṃ tajjanane yā yogyata tallakṣaṇo viṣayasvabhāva upalabdhiśabdenocyate |
SA15n1236:110: dharmmadharmmiṇośca bheda eva ityata āha- “yogyatāyāḥ” ityādi |
SA15n1236:111: yogyatā hi paramārthato bhāvarūpaiva na vasturūpāda bhidyate,
SA15n1236:112: anyathā bhāvo yogya eva na syāt |
SA15n1236:116: “tasmāt” pratiṣedhyād ghaṭādeḥ svaviṣayajñānajananayogyād yo'nya upalambhajananayogya eva na tadviparītaḥ svabhāvo ghaṭaviviktapradeśarūpaḥ sa eva cātrānupalabdhiśabdenocyate |
SA15n1236:119: kathaṃ punarayaṃ naña anyārthavṛttiḥ sāmānyaśabdaḥ san ghaṭaviviktapradeśasya tajjñānasyaiva vā ghaṭaviviktasyānupalabdhitvaṃ paryudāsavṛttyā prakalpayati,
SA15n1236:123: “yasmin” pradeśarūpādau “upalabhyamāne niyamena” avaśyaṃtayā “yasyānyasya” padārthasya ghaṭarūpāderupalabdhirbhavati “sa” ghaṭarūpādiḥ padārthaḥ “tatsaṃsṛṣṭaḥ” tena pradeśarūpādinā saṃsṛṣṭaḥ |
SA15n1236:127: yadā hi pradeśarūpaṃ vyavadhānaviprakarṣādirahitaṃ vijñāne svākāraṃ samarppayati tadā ghaṭarūpamapi tatra tathāvidhaṃ svākāraṃ samarppayatyeva |
SA15n1236:128: yadi nāma yogyatā tasya tena tulyā svasvabhāvavyavasthitestu kathaṃ tatsaṃsṛṣṭatā ?
SA15n1236:130: ekatra hi jñāne dvāvapi tau svākāradvāreṇa saṃsṛṣṭau na sākṣāt,
SA15n1236:132: kimiti punastat jñānaṃ padārthadvayākāramavaśyaṃ bhavati yatastayorjñānadvārakaḥ saṃsarggaḥ ?
SA15n1236:134: yāvetau tulyayogyatārūpau tau yadi santau bhavatastadā naivaikākāraniyatā pratipattirbhavati |
SA15n1236:136: na hyeṣa sambhavo'sti-yattulyayogyatārūpayoreka eva pratibhāseta nāpara iti |
SA15n1236:137: tathāhi-aviśiṣṭatvād yogyatāyāḥ kastatra svākāraṃ na samarppayet ? |
SA15n1236:143: karaṇadharmma evāyaṃ yadekasminneva karmaṇi kriyāṃ niṣpādayatinānekatra,
SA15n1236:147: kartrekatvāt tarhi kriyaikatra karmmaṇīti kathaṃ ‘karaṇadharmmaḥ’ ityādi vaco na plavate ? |
SA15n1236:148: na ca pratikṣaṇaviśarāruṣu bhāveṣu paramārthataḥ kartṛkaraṇādibhāvo yuktaḥ kriyā vā kācit |
SA15n1236:149: na ca sarvvakārakānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyini kārye kasyacidatiśayo'sti yenāyaṃ karttā kā(ka)
SA15n1236:154: na hyasati tulyayogyatārūpatve yugapadekendriyajanitajñānapratibhāsitā rūparasavat sambhavatīti |
SA15n1236:155: tatra yeṣāṃ saugatānāmidaṃ darśanaṃ ‘ekāyatanasaṅgṛhīte'nekatrāpyekamevendriyajñānamājāyate’ iti teṣāṃ mukhya evaikajñānasaṃsarggaḥ |
SA15n1236:156: ye tu ‘tatrāpi pratyarthaṃ bhinnānyevaikendriyanimittānyekakālāni tadviṣayāṇāṃ yugapatsannihitānāṃ svajñāneṣu sāmarthyāviśeṣāt,
SA15n1236:157: ata evaikatayā loke'dhyavasīyamānāni jñānānyupajāyante’ iti varṇṇayanti teṣāmekendriyajatvenaikāyatanaviṣayatvena caikakāleṣvekatvavyapadeśo loke tathādhyavasāyādaupacārikaḥ |
SA15n1236:158: yadi nāmaikajñānasaṃsarggāt tatsaṃsṛṣṭastathāpi sāmānyena sarvvamanyamayaṃ nañ kinna pratipadayati ?
SA15n1236:160: yasmādaviśiṣṭatvādyogyatāyā yathoktena prakāreṇaikatra jñāne dvayorapi saṃsarggaḥ tasmādaviśiṣṭaṃ yogyatārūpaṃ yayoḥ tata evaikajñānasaṃsarggiṇau tau tasmāt tayorevaṃrūpayoḥ “parasparāpekṣameva” na sarvvānyapadārthāpekṣam “anyatvamiha” anupalabdhyadhikāre “abhipretam” |
SA15n1236:161: loke tu yadyapyaśeṣapadārthāntarāpekṣamanyatvaṃ nañā kvaciducyate vyāptinyāyasamāśrayāt,
SA15n1236:168: sa eva yadā kevalaḥ pradeśo yathoktaghaṭāpekṣaya tasmādanya ucyate tadā ghaṭaviviktapradeśajñānaṃ vā'nupalabdhiḥ,
SA15n1236:172: na tu tadviviktajñānameva yathāha kumārilaḥ “vijñānaṃ vānyavastuni” iti |
SA15n1236:173: yathā hyanyavastuviṣayaṃ jñanamanubhūyamānaṃ pratiyogismaraṇāpekṣaṃ tadabhāvavyavahāranibandhanaṃ tathā tadviviktaḥ pradeśo'pi |
SA15n1236:174: tathāhi-kasyacit pratipattuḥ ‘yataḥ kealapradeśākārameva jñānaṃ mayā saṃvedyate na tu ghaṭākāramapi tasmādatra ghaṭo nāsti’ iti evaṃ nāstitājñānamutpadyate;
SA15n1236:175: kasyacit tu ‘yataḥ kevalaḥ pradeśo'yaṃ dṛśyate na tu ghaṭasahitaḥ tasmānnāstyatra ghaṭaḥ’ ityevam |
SA15n1236:176: tasmādubhayornnāstitājñānajanmani tulyaṃ sāmarthyamiti dvayorapi anupalabdhivyavasthā yukteti |
SA15n1236:177: tatra yadā tajjñānaṃ tadā jñātṛdharmmalakṣaṇā'nupalabdhiḥ kartṛsthakriyā'pekṣayā,
SA15n1236:179: evamanupalabdhiṃ paryudāsavṛttyā vyavasthāpya sādhyamasyā darśayannāha- “sā abhāvam” ityādi |
SA15n1236:180: sarvvānyopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptavivikte'pi pradeśādau dṛśyamāne yatra ghaṭādau pratiyoginyarthitvādibhiḥ smṛtirasya bhavati tasyābhāvaṃ sādhayati,
SA15n1236:187: niḥśaṅkasya ca tatra pradeśe gamanāgamanalakṣaṇā pravṛttiriti |
SA15n1236:188: atreśvarasena-kumārilayorvvacanāvakāśamāśaṅkaya siddhāntavyavasthāmeva kurvvatā tanmate niraste'pyāhatya tanmatanirāsārthamāha- “kathamanyabhāva” ityādi |
SA15n1236:189: īśvaraseno hi manyate-kārya-svabhāvahetubhyāṃ bhāvarūpābhyāṃ anupalabdheḥ pṛthakkaraṇādavaśyamabhāvarūpatvamasyāḥ,
SA15n1236:191: tvayā cānyasya pratiṣedhyaviviktasya pradeśādestajjñānasya vā bhāvarūpānupalabdhirākhyāyate tannūnamanyabhāvastadabhāvo yenaivamabhidhīyate |
SA15n1236:194: kumārilo'pyevaṃ manyate-yeyaṃ jñātṛ-jñeyadharmmalakṣaṇā dvidhā'nupalabdhirabhāvarūpā tvayocyate tasyā bhavatu nāstitājñānaṃ prati sādhanabhāvaḥ |
SA15n1236:195: kintu sa evānyasya pratiṣedhyaviviktasya vastunaḥ pratiṣedhyajñānādanyasya vā tajjñānasya yo bhāvo bhāvāṃśaḥ sa kathamabhāvaḥ ?
SA15n1236:203: ‘pratiṣedhyaṃ tajjñānaṃ vā apekṣya tadvivikto'rthastajjñānaṃ vā'bhāvo'nupalabdhiścocyate’ iti īśvarasenasya prativacanam |
SA15n1236:204: na hi prasajyapratiṣedha evaiko nañarthaḥ kintu paryudāso'pi |
SA15n1236:210: paramārthatastu pratiṣedhyābhāvavyavahārayogyatā palabdhitvena bhavato'bhimataḥ svayaṃ svarūpeṇa pramāṇenendriyapratyakṣeṇa svasaṃvedanapratyakṣeṇa ca siddhaḥ saṃstasya pratiṣedhyasyābhāvavyavahāraṃ jñānābhidhānapravṛttilakṣaṇaṃ sādhayet “tatsiddhisiddho” vā tasyānyabhāvalakṣaṇasyābhāvasya yathoktasya siddhyā siddho vā tadabhāvastasya pratiṣedhyasya tajjñānasya vā'bhāva iti evamapīṣyamāṇe “na kaścid viśeṣaḥ” tvadabhimatānupalabdhito'smadabhimatānupalabdheḥ tato'smaddarśanaṃ kimiti pratikṣipyate ? |
SA15n1236:211: nanvastyevaivamiṣyamāṇe viśeṣo'nyabhāvalakṣaṇānupalabdhiritarayā vyavahitā tadabhāvavyavahāraṃ sādhayeditarā tu sākṣādityāha-sa viśeṣo nāsti yena viśeṣeṇānupalabdhyā'bhāvarūpayā vastusaṃsparśarahitayā'smadabhimatayā'bhāvavyavahārasiddheḥ virodhaḥ syāt |
SA15n1236:215: yataḥ sa eva tvadabhimato'nyabhāvaḥ pratiṣedhyaviviktabhūtalātmakastadviṣayā copalabdhiranupalabdhitveneṣṭā bhavatastadabhāvasyānupalabdhitvenāsmanmatasya pratiṣedhyābhāvasya tadupalabdhyabhāvasya ca “kiṃ” kasmāt “na sādhanaṃ” liṅgam “iṣyate ?” |
SA15n1236:217: “kiṃ punaḥ” kasmāt punaḥ “abhāvasya” dvividhasya “siddhireva tadabhāvasiddhiḥ” na tatsādhyā kācidanyā vidyata ityasmanmataniṣedhārthaṃ lokātikrāntamiṣyata iti pūrvvapakṣaḥ |
SA15n1236:220: prathamaṃ tāvat kāraṇaṃ vivṛṇvannāha- “anyabhāvastadviviktadeśātmakastāvanna sādhanaṃ” liṅgaṃ pratiṣedhyābhāvasya,
SA15n1236:221: ‘tadupalabdhirapi tadabhāvasya na sādhanam’ iti paścād vakṣyate |
SA15n1236:224: ityāha- “yatsiddhau” yasya vastunaḥ siddhau pratītau “yasya” aparasya vastuno “na siddhi”rnna pratītiḥ tadvastu tasya vastuno liṅgaṃ bhavatītyayaṃ liṅgaliṅginornyāyaḥ |
SA15n1236:226: yathā-yadā dhūmapratītau nāgniḥ pratīyate tadā tayorlliṅgaliṅgibhāvo bhavati,
SA15n1236:229: ityata āha-“anyasya vastuno yo bhāvaḥ” svabhāva “tatsiddhyaiva” tatpratītyeva “tadabhāvaḥ” tasya pratiṣedhyasyābhāvaḥ “prasidhyati” pratīyateanyabhāvasyaiva tadabhāvātmakatvāt tatsiddhereva tatsiddhilakṣaṇatvāt |
SA15n1236:230: naiyāyikāstu manyante-pratiṣedhyābhāvo hi prasajyapratiṣedhātmakastuccharūpastasya kathaṃ tadanyabhāvarūpatā ?
SA15n1236:233: ityata āha- “tasya” tadanyabhāvasya pradeśalakṣaṇasya tasmādanyena pratiṣedhyena ghaṭādinā “asaṃsṛṣṭarūpasya” rahitātmanaḥ kevalasya pratiṣedhyena śūnyātmanaḥ |
SA15n1236:236: iti cet; na, pararūpeṇa tasyāpi tuccharūpatvāt |
SA15n1236:237: yathā hyanapekṣitabhāvāntarasaṃsargaḥ prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ śūnyavikalpapratibhāsī pratiṣedhyena tuccharūpaḥ tadrūpavirahāt,
SA15n1236:241: anyathā kathamasyānyabhāvatvaṃ parasya vā tatrābhāvaḥ syāt ? |
SA15n1236:242: yo hi yadabhāvarūpo na bhavati sa evāsau bhavati,
SA15n1236:245: tasmāt sarvvabhāvāḥ pararūpeṇa niḥsvabhāvāḥ svarūpeṇa rūpavattve'pī tyanavadyam |
SA15n1236:247: na kaścit, kevalamanapekṣitarūpāntaramabhāvamātraṃ prasajyapratiṣedha iti loke kathyate |
SA15n1236:249: na tu rūpāntaraṃ pararūpatucchātmakaṃ na bhavati |
SA15n1236:251: kathaṃ tasya prasajyapratiṣedhātmatā na syāt pararūpeṇa ? |
SA15n1236:254: tādātmyābhāve hi prasajyapratiṣedhasya paryudastāt pratītau tatkāraṇatve sati syāt pratipattiḥ nānyathā |
SA15n1236:255: tasya tadanyāsaṃsṛṣṭarūpasya yat tattvaṃ tasya pratiṣedhyatuccharūpatāyā vyavasthāpakaṃ pramāṇaṃ pratyakṣarūpam tata eva-na taduttarakālabhāvino ‘nāstīha ghaṭaḥ’ iti vikalpāt,
SA15n1236:256: tasya gṛhītagrāhitayā smṛtitvenāpramāṇatvāt-anyasya ghaṭādestatrāsato vyavacchedasyābhāvasya siddhestadabhāvātmakasyaiva pradeśasya tena grahaṇāt |
SA15n1236:257: dvividho hyayaṃ pradeśo ghaṭāsaṃsṛṣṭarūpsastavdyāvṛttarūpatayā tato'nyo ghaṭavānapi,
SA15n1236:259: tasya tadvivekena pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇe ghaṭādanyatvaṃ ghaṭavirahaśca gṛhīta eva bhavatīti na vastvasaṃkarasiddhyartham,
SA15n1236:262: yataścānyabhāvasiddhyaiva tadabhāva uktena nyāyena siddhyati tato nānyabhāvaḥ pratiṣedhyābhāvasya liṅgam |
SA15n1236:269: anyathoktena nyāyenānyabhāvasyaiva tadabhāvarūpatve tādātmyāt kathaṃ sambandhābhāvaḥ ? |
SA15n1236:272: “tacca tasya” ityādyasyaiva vivaraṇaṃ vyatirekamukhena “ekārthasamavāya” iti paradarśanenoktaṃ |
SA15n1236:273: pareṣāṃ hi naiyāyikādīnāṃ vyatiriktāveva kṛtakānityatvākhyau dharmmāvekasminneva dharmmiṇi samavetāviti kṛtakasyānityatvenaikasminnarthe dharmmiṇi samavāyaḥ sambandhaḥ dhamasya veti sambandha evodāharaṇāntaram |
SA15n1236:274: atraikarthasamavāya iti saṃyogaḥ sa eva samavāyaśabdenoktaḥ |
SA15n1236:276: pareṣāṃ tvagnidhūmau svāvayaveṣveva samavetāviti na tayorekārthasamavāya ādhārādheyabhāvo veti dhūmasyāgnerupari darśanāllaukikaḥ sambandha uktaḥ |
SA15n1236:279: nanu ceśvarasenena saha vicāraḥ prakrāntaḥ tat kimiti naiyāyikābhimasyāpi sambandhasyānyabhāvatadabhāvayorabhāva ucyate |
SA15n1236:281: pūrvvaṃ hyanyabhāvagrāhipratyakṣasiddhatvāt pratiṣedhyābhāvasya na tadarthaṃ pratyakṣāntaraṃ ‘nāstīha ghaṭaḥ’ ityevamākāraṃ kalpanīyamiti prasaṅgataḥ kathitam |
SA15n1236:282: adhunā tu prasaṅgādidamucyate-yadānyabhāvagrāhipratyakṣasiddho'yaṃ tadabhāvo na bhavati tadā pratyakṣāntaraṃ ‘nāsti iha ghaṭaḥ’ ityevamākāraṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvalakṣaṇāt sannikarṣādiṣṭaṃ bhavatā |
SA15n1236:285: tataḥ kutastallakṣaṇāt sannikarṣāt tadabhāve pratyakṣaṃ bhavediti |
SA15n1236:286: evaṃ sambandhasvarūpamākhyāya tasyehāsambhavamāha- “naivam” yathā kṛtakatvānityatvayoragnidhūmayorvvaikārthasamavāyādilakṣaṇaḥ sambandho naivaṃ kaścid bhāvābhāvayoḥ sambandho yena “asya” tadabhāvasyānyabhāvaḥ sādhanaṃ syāt |
SA15n1236:288: anyabhāvaśca pradeśākhyaḥ svāvayaveṣu yeṣu varttate na tatra ghaṭābhāvaḥ |
SA15n1236:289: evaṃ hi pradeśāvayaveṣu ghaṭo nāstīti syāt na pradeśe |
SA15n1236:308: yataḥ so'pi saṃyoganimitta ucyate ‘iha kuṇḍe badarāṇi’ iti |
SA15n1236:331: samavāyopyasyānantarameva nirasta iti kutaḥ svakāraṇasattāsamavāyarūpā kāryatā tadabhāvasya syāt ? |
SA15n1236:335: yathā hi artho viṣayaḥ śabdo viṣayīti tayorvviṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ sambandhaḥ,
SA15n1236:343: tenārthena vivakṣāviparivarttinā śabdasya kāryakāraṇalakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ syāt |
SA15n1236:344: yadyapi ca śabdārthayoḥ buddhiparikalpitasāmānyarūpatā tathāpyarthapratibhāsinyā vivakṣayā śabdasāmānyotprekṣānibandhanasya śabdasvalakṣaṇasyotthāpanāt tanmukhena kāryakāraṇabhāva ucyate |
SA15n1236:346: paro hyavinābhāvalakṣaṇaḥ śabdārthayoḥ sambandha iti vyavaharati |
SA15n1236:350: nahi ghaṭābhāvapratipādanābhiprāye sati anyabhāvasya pradeśalakṣaṇasya prayogo niṣpattirbhavati,
SA15n1236:351: ghaṭābhāvapratipādanābhiprāyāt prāgapi pradeśasya svahetubhya eva niṣpatteḥ |
SA15n1236:356: syānmatam-yathā śabdārthayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvanimitto viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ tathā anyabhāvatadabhāvayorapi ityetāvanmātreṇa śabdārthayordṛṣṭāntatetyata āha-“siddhe hi” ityādi |
SA15n1236:357: śabdārthayorhi kāryakāraṇabhāvanibandhanaḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ anyathā'rthāntaratve tadayogāt tathehāpi yadi tadabhāvānyabhāvayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ sidhyet tadā tanmukhena sādhyasādhanabhāvadvāreṇa viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ syāt |
SA15n1236:358: yāvatā sa eva sādhyasādhanabhāvo'sati sambandhe kāryakāraṇabhāvādike na sidhyati,
SA15n1236:366: naiva sambandhāntaranibandhano'nyabhāvatadabhāvayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvo'pi tu viṣayaviṣayibhāvanimitta eveti cet;
SA15n1236:367: āha- “anyathā” yadi sambandhāntaraṃ neṣyate kintu viṣayaviṣayibhāvāt sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ tasmācca viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ,
SA15n1236:370: kiñcānyabhāvācca liṅgabhūtādabhāvasya liṅginaḥ siddhāvanumitāviṣyamāṇāyāṃ asamudāyaśca sādhyaḥ syāt,
SA15n1236:371: anyabhāvena tadabhāvasya kevalasyaiva sādhanāt na kevalasambandhābhāvāt sādhyasādhanabhāvāyogaḥ |
SA15n1236:372: samudāyaśca viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvāpanno dharmmadharmmilakṣaṇaḥ sādhyo ya iṣṭastadabhāvadoṣaśceti ‘ca’ śabdaḥ |
SA15n1236:374: āha- “tathā ca” dharmmamātrasyāpi svatantrasya sādhyatopagame ‘ghaṭābhāvastadanyabhāvāt’ ityevaṃrūpe prayoge ghaṭasya sarvvatra deśe sarvvadā cābhāvaḥ prasajyeta |
SA15n1236:375: dharmmiṇi hi kvaciddharmmasya guṇabhūtasya sādhane tatraiva tatkāla eva ca bhāvo yukto nānyadeti sarvvatra samudāya eva sādhyo'bhyupagantavyaḥ na kevalo dharmma iti |
SA15n1236:379: ‘iha pradeśe ghaṭo nāsti’ ityevaṃ ghaṭābhāvena pradeśādirdharmmī viśeṣyate saghaṭāt pradeśāderbhedenāvasthāpyata iti tadviśeṣaṇatvaṃ prāptasādhyate na tu ghaṭo nāstītyevaṃ “kevalo” dharmmiṇaḥ kasyacigduṇabhāvamanāpannaḥ |
SA15n1236:384: tathā hi-śabdādidharmmiṇā kṛtakatvādestādātmyalakṣaṇa eva sambandha iṣyate bhavatā |
SA15n1236:387: siddhāntavādī tu sādhyadharmmalakṣaṇasya liṅgino ghaṭābhāvākhyasyānyabhāvena liṅgena sambandhābhāvaḥ prāgukto na dharmmiṇā tataḥ damuttaraṃ sāṃbadhyata iti manyamāno dharmmiṇā'pyanyabhāvākhyasya liṅgasya sambandhābhāvaṃ darśayannāha-“na” liṅgaliṅginorasambandho na ceti sambadhyate |
SA15n1236:389: kintu liṅgaliṅginorasambandha evāsamudāyasādhanameva ca evamapi bruvataḥ |
SA15n1236:392: etadeva darśayati-yatraiva hi pradeśādau dharmmitayā tvayā kalpyamāne yad ghaṭādikaṃ nāsītyucyate lokena sa eva pradeśādistena ghaṭādinā'saṃsṛṣṭassaṃsargarahitaḥ “anyabhāvo” liṅgatayeṣṭo nāparaḥ kaścit yataḥ “taddarśanādeva” ghaṭāsaṃsṛṣṭapradeśādidarśanādevāsya pratipattuḥ ‘ghaṭo nāsti’ iti vikalpo liṅgijñānatayopagato bhavati |
SA15n1236:394: yadeva hi dṛśyamānaṃ liṅgijñānaṃ janayati tadeva liṅgamucyate |
SA15n1236:397: tataḥ kathaṃ tasyaivānyabhāvasya vyāvṛttito'pi bhedamananubhavato liṅgaliṅgibhāvo liṅgatvaṃ liṅgitvaṃ vā ? |
SA15n1236:403: tataḥ śabdādidharmmipratipattāvapyanityatvādyapratītau kṛtakatvādinā tat sādhyata iti yuktam |
SA15n1236:404: syānmatam-sāmānyaviśeṣakalpanayā liṅgaliṅgitaikasyāpi bhaviṣyatītyata āha- “na cātra” prakṛte'nyabhāve “sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvakalpanā sambhavati”,
SA15n1236:405: yena sāmānyaviśeṣavikalpena sāmānyaṃ heturbhaved viśeṣo dharmmī,
SA15n1236:406: yataḥ samudāyasādhyatā liṅgaliṅginoḥ sambandho vā syāt |
SA15n1236:407: kuto na sambhavatītyāha-tadviśeṣapratipattereva” ghaṭaviviktapradeśaviśeṣapratipattereva “tadabhāvasya” ghaṭābhāvasya pratīteḥ |
SA15n1236:408: yataśca viśeṣa eva ghaṭābhāvapratītinibandhanaṃ tataḥ kiṃ tatra sāmānyakalpanayā kriyata iti |
SA15n1236:409: sa eva viśeṣo'nyatra varttamānaḥ sāmānyarūpatāṃ pratipatsyata iti cet,
SA15n1236:410: āha- “tasya” ghaṭaviviktapradeśaviśeṣasya “anyatra” sajātīye “anvayasya” anuvṛtterabhāvāt kutaḥ sāmānyātmatā ? |
SA15n1236:413: yadi hi ghaṭavivikta eva pradeśaviśeṣo dharmmī,
SA15n1236:415: tadā pratijñāyā yo'rtho dharmmadharmmisamudāyastadekadeśa eva dharmmilakṣaṇo hetuḥ syāt,
SA15n1236:418: atha mā bhūt eṣa doṣa iti na ghaṭavivikta eva pradeśaviśeṣo heturiṣyate,
SA15n1236:419: kintu pradeśamātraṃ ghaṭaviviktatāviśeṣarahitamityata āha-“na ca yatra pradeśamātraṃ tatra ghaṭābhāvaḥ” |
SA15n1236:420: saghaṭe'pi pradeśe pradeśamātrasya bhāvādanaikāntiko hetuḥ syāt |
SA15n1236:422: yādṛśo ghaṭaviviktaḥ kevalaḥ pradeśo'grataḥ sthitastādṛśe sarvvatra pradeśe ghaṭasyābhāva iti kuto'nekāntaḥ ? |
SA15n1236:424: yo'sau kevalaḥ pradeśaviśeṣo dharmmitayā'vasthāpitastasyaiva yat kaivalyaṃ kevala ityanena viśeṣaṇenocyate bhavatā,
SA15n1236:425: ta deva ghaṭaviraho ghaṭābhāva iti kathyate |
SA15n1236:426: sa ca ghaṭaviraho liṅgabhūtasya kevalasya pradeśasya pratipattāveva siddho na tūttarakālaṃ tato'nya eva ākārāntareṇa dhūmādivāgniḥ sidhyati |
SA15n1236:430: kevalapradeśapratipattāveva ghaṭavirahapratītau ca yadetaduttarakālaṃ ‘yatra yatra kevalaḥ pradeśastatra tatra ghaṭavirahaḥ’ iti “anvayasyānugamāmanu( gamanam” anu)
SA15n1236:432: yata evaṃ tasmādanyabhāvaḥ kevalapradeśalakṣaṇaḥ sādhyasādhanayorbhedābhāvānna sādhanamabhāvasyeti sthitam |
SA15n1236:433: tadevaṃ samudāyasādhyatāṃ liṅgasya ca dharmmiṇāsambandhaṃ pratipādayituṃ yaduktaṃ pareṇa- ‘pradeśādidharmmiviśeṣaṇasyābhāvasya sādhanāt’ iti tadapṛthaksiddhidūṣaṇenaiva nirākṛtam |
SA15n1236:434: viṣayaviṣayibhāvena tu sambandhapratipādane niraste paro'nyathā sambandhaṃ sādhyasādhanayorddarśayannāha- “astya”nyabhāvatadabhāvayoḥ sambandho virodhākhyaḥ |
SA15n1236:436: siddhāntavādī tu sādhyasādhanayorvvirodhamevāsambhāvayan pṛcchati- “kena kasya virodhaḥ” iti |
SA15n1236:438: paro virodhamabhiprāyanabhijñatayā darśayati- “anyabhāvena” kevalapradeśātmanā “pratiyogino” yasyābhāvaḥ pramātumiṣṭo ghaṭādestasyeti |
SA15n1236:439: parasyaivaṃvādino asambandhābhidhāyitāmādarśayannāha-“kiṃ nu vai pratiyogī” ghaṭādiḥ pramātumiṣṭo yena pratiyoginaḥ prameyatvena liṅgaliṅginorvvirodhaḥ sambandho'bhidhīyate ? |
SA15n1236:440: naiva pratiyogī pramātumiṣṭaḥ kintu tadabhāva iti cet,
SA15n1236:443: yamabhāvāṃśastato nānyabhāva eva tadabhāva iti kathaṃ tatpratipattireva tadabhāvapratipattiriti |
SA15n1236:445: na cāvastuno bhedaḥ sambhavati ato'yaṃ vasturūpa eva | yadāha-
SA15n1236:453: “tasyā”nyasya pradeśasya kevalasya yat tat “kaivalya” mekākikatvamasahāyatā tadeva “aparasya” pratiyogino ghaṭādeḥ “vaikalyam” abhāva “iti” tasmāt “tadanyabhāva eva” bhāvāṃśa eva tvadabhimataḥ “tadabhāvaḥ” pratiyogyabhāvāṃśo na tataḥ pṛthagbhūtaṃ dharmmāntaramityucyate sugatasutaiḥ |
SA15n1236:454: tataśca “tatpratipattireva ca” tasyānyabhāvasya pratipattireva ca “tadapratipattiḥ” tasya pratiyogino'pratipattirabhāvapratipattiriti yāvat |
SA15n1236:455: evaṃ manyate-yo'yamabhāvāṃśo bhāvāṃśāt pṛthagbhūto vastuno dharmmaḥ parikalpyate sa ghaṭādyabhāvātmakatāṃ tadrūpavaikalyādevānubhavati nānyathā |
SA15n1236:458: nahi yad yadrūpavikalaṃ na bhavati tat tato'nyatvamanubhavati,
SA15n1236:463: sarvvasya ca sarvvatropayogaḥ syādityavaśyamanyavastuno bhāvarūpatā tadanyābhāvātmikaiva |
SA15n1236:465: tatsaṃyoga eva cendriyasya tadanyābhāvasaṃyoga iti kimucyate-
SA15n1236:469: pratyakṣeṇa tadākārotpattyā tadanyabhāvātmake eva vasturūpe pratipanne pāścātyasya yathāgṛhītābhilāpino vikalpasyopagamāt |
SA15n1236:470: vistarataścāyamabhāvavicāraḥ pramāṇadvitvasiddhāvabhāvaṃ prameyaṃ pramāṇaṃ ca vicārayatā vihita iti tata evāvavadhārya iti |
SA15n1236:473: ‘nāstyatredam’ ityabhāvavyavahārārthaṃ cābhāvapramāṇaparikalpanā yukteti darśayannāha- “anyathā” yadi tatpratipattireva tadabhāvapratipattiriti neṣyate tadā “tasya” anyavastunaḥ svarūpaparicchedena tato'nyasyātadrūpasya “avyavacchede” anirākaraṇe tadabhāvāpratipattau “tatpariccheda eva na syāt”-tasya tadanyavastunaḥ svarūpapratipattireva na syāt |
SA15n1236:475: “tadatadrūpayoḥ” tasya tadanyavastuno yadrūpaṃ pratiniyataṃ sakalatrailokyavilakṣaṇaṃ yaccātadrūpaṃ tadrūpaṃ na bhavati pararūpaṃ tayoḥ “avivekād” avivecanād vivekenāvyavasthāpanādasāṅkaryeṇāprasādhanāt |
SA15n1236:476: sakalapararūpāsaṅkirṇṇaṃ hi tadrūpam taccet tatsāmarthyabhāvinā pratyakṣeṇa tathā nānukṛtaṃ kevalaṃ sammugdhākārameva tadutpannaṃ tadā kathantena tatparicchedaḥ syāt ? |
SA15n1236:477: na hi yadrūpaṃ yadvastu tadrūpānanukāriṇā jñānena tatparicchedo yukto yathā-śukuśaṅkharūpānanukāriṇā kāmalinaḥ pītaśaṅkhāvabhāsinā jñāneneti |
SA15n1236:482: ityata āha-“ya eṣa vyavahāraḥ” sarvvajanapratitaḥ “kasyacid” agnyādervvastuno darśanāt “kvaciddeśe” tatsambandhini “prāptyartho” dṛṣṭasyādṛṣṭasya ca “parihārārthaḥ” pravṛttinivṛttilakṣaṇaḥ “sa na syāt” |
SA15n1236:484: “na hi” yasmād “ayaṃ” pratipattā “analaṃ paśyannapi” saṅkīrṇṇatadadrūpapratibhāsinā pratyakṣeṇa,
SA15n1236:486: tathā hi-asaṅkīrṇṇasyādarśane saṅkīrṇṇamapi yadi na paśyet tadā loṣṭādiprakhyaṃ kathaṃ kasyacidetaddarśanaṃ syāt ? |
SA15n1236:487: sa evaṃbhūtaḥ saṅkīrṇṇadarśanavān pratipattā katham “analameva paśyati” na salilādikam ? |
SA15n1236:489: tataḥ kathaṃ “salilārthī tatra” agnimati pradeśe “na pravarteta” ? |
SA15n1236:493: tato jñānadvayena tadatadrūpayorvvivekālloke pravṛttinivṛttilakṣaṇaḥ pratiniyato vyavahāraḥ sidhyatīti |
SA15n1236:495: kadācit paro brūyāt salilopalambhavirahamātramityata āha- “yadi salila” ityādi |
SA15n1236:500: kintu yo'sāvātmanaḥ pratiṣedhyavastupratibhāsijñānātmanā'pariṇāmaḥ sa tadanyavastupratibhāsijñānasahacarito'bhyupagantavyo na kevala iti paramabhyupagamayitumasyopanyāsaḥ |
SA15n1236:503: na ca tadanyavastuvijñānapariṇāmādanya eva tasyāpariṇāmo nāma bhavato'bhimato bhāvāntarasyaivābhāvatvenopagatatvāt |
SA15n1236:504: tulyayogyatārūpasyaikajñānasaṃsarggiṇa eva cānyavastuno vijñānaṃ tathopeyaṃ nānyasya,
SA15n1236:508: rūpāntarāvabhāsitve hi tasya salilopalambhābhāva eva na sidhyet |
SA15n1236:511: tatra yadi salilopalambhābhāvaḥ tuccharūpo'nupalambhastadā kathamabhāvaḥ kasyacit pratipattiḥ pariccheda iti yāvat,
SA15n1236:513: atha na tasya pratipattirūpateṣyate kintu taddhetubhāva ityata āha-“pratipattiheturvvā” iti |
SA15n1236:514: nahi sarvvasāmarthyavirahalakṣaṇasyābhāvasya pratipattiṃ prati hetubhāvo yuktaḥ |
SA15n1236:515: hetubhāve vā tasyānapekṣitasahakāriṇo nityaṃ tajjñānajananādabhāvajñānamevaikaṃ pratipattuḥ syāt,
SA15n1236:517: na cājñātasyāsya nāstitājñānajananaṃ yuktamityāha- “tasyāpi” salilopalambhābhāvasya kathaṃ pratipattiḥ ? |
SA15n1236:518: athāyaṃ salilopalambhābhāvaḥ svayamapratīta eva salilābhāvapratītiṃ janayati tadā kasyacidapi |
SA15n1236:519: tadevāha- “tasya” salilopalambhābhāvasya tato vā salilādanyasyānalādeḥ ‘vijñānaṃ vā'nyavastuni’ ityata ātmano'pariṇāmasya pṛthagavasthāpanāt,
SA15n1236:520: tatrāpi tadaṅgīkaraṇe cātmano'pariṇāmasya tadātmakatvānna tato bhedena vyavasthāpyeta |
SA15n1236:521: tataśca kasyacidapi tasya tadanyasya vā'pratipattāvapi yadyabhāvaḥ salilādeḥ pratīyate tadā svāpādyavasthāsvapi salilādyabhāvaḥ kiṃ na pratīyate ? |
SA15n1236:527: yada caivamuktena prakāreṇānupalambhena salilābhāvapratītirna yujyate'nalapratibhāsinaśca jñānasya pratiniyatākāratā nābhyupagamyate “tasmādayam” analadarśī pratipattā'nalaṃ “paśyannapi” saṅkīrṇṇarūpapratibhāsinā jñānena ‘analo'yaṃ na salilam’ iti nādhyavasyati anadhyavasyaṃśca salilarūpasyāpi pratibhāsanāt tadarthī “na tiṣṭhet” pravarteta “nāpi pratiṣṭheta” salilārthī na pravarteta |
SA15n1236:532: na mayā salilopalambhanivṛttimātrāt tu ccharūpāt tadabhāvagatirucyate,
SA15n1236:534: kintu yadetadekasya kevalasyānalasya darśanaṃ tata evānyasya tatrāpratibhāsamānasya salilasyābhāvagatirbhavati ‘vijñānaṃ vā'nyavastuni’ iti vacanāt |
SA15n1236:539: “tasyaiva” paridṛśyamānasyānalādeḥ “kevalasya ” salilāsaṃsṛṣṭarūpasya “darśanād” analajñāne pratibhāsanāt ‘salilaṃ nāsti’ iti niścayaḥ sañjāyate |
SA15n1236:540: tathāhi-anala iva salilamapi yadi tatrābhaviṣyat tadapyanalavad darśane pratyayabhāsiṣyata tayoḥ svajñānaṃ pratyaviśiṣṭatvād yogyatāyā naikasya pratibhāso yuktaḥ |
SA15n1236:541: tasmādekapratibhāsanamanyābhāvanāntarīyakaṃ ityanyābhāve tato jñānamutpadyate anyavastuni ca vijñānaṃ nāstīti jñānaṃ janayati |
SA15n1236:543: tadrūpatayaiva ca tajjñānamanyat pratiyadevaṃ vyapadiśyate'nyathā tadayogādityanyapratipattireva tadabhāvavikalpaheturiti siddhāntavādyāha- “idameva” ityādi |
SA15n1236:544: nanvasmābhiridameva prāgabhihitaṃ “tayoḥ satoḥ naikarūpaniyatā pratipattiḥ asambhavāt” ityādibhirvvacanaiḥ |
SA15n1236:545: tato yadevānyāsaṃsarggiṇaḥ kevalasya pratibhāsanaṃ tadeva tadanyābhāvasyāpi,
SA15n1236:547: tataḥ pratyakṣāvabhāsitatvāt tadabhāvasya tabdalāt pāścātyaṃ vyavahārapravartanarūpaṃ nāstitājñānaṃ vikalpakamājāyate |
SA15n1236:549: yatastadanyavastuni vijñānaṃ pratyakṣātmakamapyanavagate tadanyābhāve jñānaṃ janayat pṛthagabhāvapramāṇatayā vyavasthāpyeta |
SA15n1236:550: tathā hi- tadanyākāraśūnya eva tadekajñānākāraḥ saṃvedyate |
SA15n1236:554: tato yathā nirvvikalpajñānāvasite kvacidanale ‘analo'trāsti’ iti pāścātyo vikalpo vyavahārapravartanamātraṃ na tataḥ pṛthak pramāṇaṃ yathoktaṃ prāk,
SA15n1236:555: tathā nāstitājñānamapi vikalpakaṃ tatphaṃladvāreṇa vā'nyavastuvijñānaṃ na pratyakṣāt pṛthagabhāvākhyaṃ pramāṇamiti |
SA15n1236:557: tadeva tvayā'pyabhidhīyata iti kasmāt paruṣamivābhāti yatastadanabhyupagamena pṛthagabhāvākhyaṃ pramāṇamabhyupagatamityupahasati |
SA15n1236:558: tathā hyagatyedānīṃ tvayocyate na madhyasthatayā anyathedameva kiṃ na pūrvvamevābhihitam ?
SA15n1236:559: , yata ālajālabhidhānenā''tmā parikleśita ityupasaṃharannāha-“ tasmāt tīrādarśineva” ityādi |
SA15n1236:560: yathā kila vahanārūḍhairvvarṇigbhiḥ śakunirmucyate api nāma tīraṃ drakṣyatīti |
SA15n1236:561: sa yadā sarvvataḥ paryaṭaṃstīreṃ nāsādayati tadā vahanamevāgacchati tadvadetadapi draṣṭavyam |
SA15n1236:562: yataścāvaśyabhyupagamanīyo'yaṃ pakṣastasmānna kiñcidanayā'vidyamānapratiṣṭhānayā diśaḥ pratipattyā prayojanam |
SA15n1236:563: tadevaṃ parasyānyabhāvatadabhāvayorliṅgaliṅgibhāvamicchataḥ sambandhābhāvādasāvayuktaḥ iti pratipādite pareṇa ‘asati sambandhe'nyabhāvagatyā'pi tadabhāvagatirnna syāt’ iti codite ‘na vai kutaścit sambandhād’ ityādyabhihitam |
SA15n1236:564: ataḥ ‘anyabhāva eva tadabhāvo'nyabhāvagatireva ca tadabhāvagatiḥ’ iti prasādhayatā kumārilaparikalpitaḥ kasyacidabhāvaniścayārthamabhāvapramāṇavādaḥ prasaṅgato nirastaḥ samprati tu-
SA15n1236:567: yadi hi “ekasya” kevalasya paricchedādanyasya “vyavacchedaḥ” pratiṣedhaḥ sidhyati tadā sarvvasyā a(syā)
SA15n1236:569: na tu viśeṣaparigraheṇa tulyā svajñānajananaṃ prati yogyāvasthā yasya tasyaiveti |
SA15n1236:573: tataśca tadviviktākāratayā tadanyābhavasādhane viśeṣābhāvāt pradeśarūpajñānaṃ ghaṭābhavamiva rasādyabhāvamapi sādhayet,
SA15n1236:575: kiñca, yadetad ‘upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdhirabhāvasādhanī’ iti viśeṣaṇamuktaṃ tacca na vaktavyam |
SA15n1236:577: yato ye'pyanupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptāsteṣāmapi tatra deśe tadekākāratayā jñānasya vyavacchedo bhavatyeva |
SA15n1236:578: tathā hi-yathopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptāstadekākāravati jñāne na pratibhāsante tataśca vyavacchidyante tathā'nupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptā apīti kim ‘upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya” ityanena viśeṣaṇeneti |
SA15n1236:579: evaṃ pūrvvapakṣe vyavasthite yadi tadanyavyavacchedaḥ-tataḥ pṛthakkaraṇamanyatvena vyavasthāpanamabhimataṃ tadabhyupagamyata eva |
SA15n1236:582: yena hi sāmarthyena tulyayogyatārūpasyopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya cābhāvaṃ sādhayati na tatsāmarthyamatulyayogyatārūpe'nupalbdhilakṣaṇaprāpte vā sambhavati |
SA15n1236:583: ‘tayoḥ satornnaikarūpaniyatā pratipattiḥ asambhavāt’ ityevaṃ hi tadabhāvasādhanam |
SA15n1236:585: yat puro'vasthitaṃ pratyakṣe'vabhāsate tasyaikasyātmanaḥ pratiniyatasya rūpasya paricchedāt tadākārotpattyā vidhivikalpotpādanena ca yaḥ “tadanyaḥ” tato'nyastadvayatiriktastasya sarvvasya ya “ātmā” svabhāvastato “vyavacchedo” bhedanaṃ pṛthakkaraṇamanyatvasādhanamasaṅkīrṇṇarūpatāpratyāyanaṃ bhavati |
SA15n1236:586: kathaṃ punarekātmaparicchedādeva tasya tadanyātmano vyavacchedaḥ pratyakṣeṇa kriyate ?
SA15n1236:588: yattu tadvayatiriktamaśeṣapadārthajātaṃ tadātmanastasya puro'vasthitasya kathaṃ tavdyavacchedakam ?
SA15n1236:596: tasmin pararūpāsaṃkīrṇṇe svabhāvata eva tadātmaniyato yaḥ pratibhāsaḥ pararūpapratibhāsāsaṃkīrṇṇaḥ tadekapadārthasāmarthyabhāvini pratyakṣe pararūpapratibhāsāyogāt tasya bhrāntatāpattyā pratyakṣātāhāneḥ |
SA15n1236:598: tasya tadātmaniyatapratibhāsaya jñānāt pratyakṣeṇa svasaṃvittyā saṃvedanāt |
SA15n1236:599: tatsaṃvedanameva hi pratyakṣasyātadrūpād “vyavacchedanaṃ” pṛthakkaraṇaṃ tabdalenaiva ca pāścātyaḥ ‘anyātmakametanna bhavati’ ityasāṃkaryavasthāpratyayo vikalpakaḥ saṃjāyate gṝhītagrāhī |
SA15n1236:602: yadi nāma tadātmaniyatapratibhāsajñānaṃ tathāpi kathamanyātmanaḥ tasya pṛthakkaraṇam ?
SA15n1236:604: yasmāttasya vastuno ya ātmā pararūpāsaṃkīrṇṇaḥ sa tadanyasya śeṣasya vastuna ātmā na bhavati,
SA15n1236:611: tadā'sya viṣayasyānyātmanaḥ sakāśādavyavacchede pṛthagavyavasthāpane parātmano'pi tatra paricchedaḥ syāt,
SA15n1236:613: tataścāvyavacchede'nyātmanastatparicchedaprasaṅgāt pravṛttinivṛttyorabhāva iti pūrvvaḥ prasaṅgo ‘na hyayamanalaṃ paśyannapi’ ityādikaḥ |
SA15n1236:614: na kevalamanyātmanastannivarttayati tadātmano'pyaśeṣamanyaditi darśayannāha- “taṃ ca” agrataḥ sthitaṃ deśakālasvabhāvāvasthāniyataṃ tadanyadeśādibhyo vyāvṛttātmanaḥ svahetubhyaḥ evāsya bhāvāt,
SA15n1236:615: “tadātmanā” deśādiniyatenātmanā tathāvidhasvabhāvasyaivānukārādupalabhamānā buddhiḥ “tathātvapracyutim” anyadeśakālasvabhāvāvasthatām “asya” svaviṣayasya “vyavacchinatti” tataḥ pṛthakkaroti |
SA15n1236:616: kasmātpunaranyadeśāditāṃ tataḥ pṛthagavasthāpayati ityata āha- “evaṃ hi” yasmādanyadeśatādestataḥ pṛthakkaraṇe sati taddeśādiniyataḥ padārthaḥ paricchinno bhavati,
SA15n1236:618: yadyanyathābhāvo'nyadeśāditā tadrūpānanukārāvdyavacchinnaḥ-bhavati tathātvaṃ ca taddeśādiniyatatvaṃ ca,
SA15n1236:620: yata evam “iti” tasmādanyathābhūtādanyadeśādimatastathābhūtaṃ taddeśādimaṃtaṃ “vyavacchindatyeva” nivarttayantyeva tat paricchinattīti pūrvvakasyopasaṃhāraḥ |
SA15n1236:621: tathā “tathābhūtādanyathābhūtaṃ vyavacchindatyeva” iti dvitīyasyopasaṃhāraḥ kārya iti |
SA15n1236:622: “evam” uktena nyāyena “ekasya” pramāṇasya pratyakṣasyānumānasya vā tasyāpyevameva svaviṣayaparicchedād “vṛttiḥ” pravṛttiḥ sarvvabhāvān “dvairāśye” tattve'nyatve ca “vyavasthāpayati” |
SA15n1236:625: nanu ca vikalpavyāpāra eṣa ‘idamanyātmakaṃ na bhavati anyathaitadātmakam’ iti |
SA15n1236:628: taddhi pratyakṣaṃ vidhipratiṣedhavikalpau yadā svaviṣaye janayati tadaivāsya sāphalyam,
SA15n1236:629: tadaiva ca pramāṇamiṣyate nānyadā ata evaikasyārthasvabhāvasyāpratipannāṃśābhāvāt sarvvātmanā paricchede'pi bhrāntikāraṇasabhdāvāt kṣaṇikatādāvanvayavyatirekabuddhī janayitumasāmarthyāt tatrāsya prāmāṇyaṃ neṣyata iti |
SA15n1236:630: syānmatam- dvairāśyasādhane'pyasāṃkaryasiddhyarthā mā bhūdabhāvapramāṇakalpanā kintu prakārāntarābhāvasiddhyarthā bhaviṣyati |
SA15n1236:631: na hi tadabhāvasiddhau pratyakṣasya kaścid vyāpāraḥ pratipādita iti ata āha “tadvyatirikte”tyādi |
SA15n1236:632: tasmāt paridṛśyamānād vyatiriktasyāśeṣasya vastuno vyavacchedena tataḥ pṛthakkaraṇenānyatvena yā vyāptistatsādhanādeva prakārāntarasya tattvānyatvabahirbhūtasyābhāvaḥ sidhyati |
SA15n1236:634: atha matam-sarvvasyāparidṛṣṭasya dṛśyamānādanyatayā vyāptiṃ naivaṃ pratyakṣaṃ sādhayati tat kutastṛtīyarāśyabhāvaḥ pratyakṣata eva syāt,
SA15n1236:635: yato'bhāvaprāmāṇyakalpanā vyarthā bhavedityata āha- “tasya” tṛtīyarāśitayā kalpyamānasya tato dṛṣṭādanyatayā vyāptyabhāve “tena” pratyakṣeṇa “tato”'rthāt svaviṣayasya “avyavacchedā” dapṛthakkaraṇāt,
SA15n1236:636: tadarthasya ca rāśyantaratvena kalpyamānasya svaviṣayādavyavacchedāt apṛthakkaraṇāt punarapi bhāvasya svaviṣayasyāparicchedaprasaṅgāt |
SA15n1236:637: sa hi tadviṣayaḥ sakalapararūpāsaṃkīrṇṇātmā yadi tenātmanā na paricchinnaḥ kathaṃ tena tasya paricchedaḥ ? |
SA15n1236:638: tenātmanā paricchede vā kathaṃ sarvvasya tadanyatayā vyāptyasādhanam ?
SA15n1236:641: yata evaṃ “tasmāt” kvacidvastuni pramāṇaṃ pratyakṣādikaṃ pravṛttaṃ tadvastu pratiniyatenātmanā paricchinatti,
SA15n1236:647: evamekasya pramāṇasya vyāpāra eṣo'nantarokta iti tamevopasaṃhṛtya sukhapratipattaye darśayannāha- “tathāhi” kvacidvastuni “pramāṇaṃ” pratyakṣādi pravṛttaṃ “tadeva” vastu tadanyasmāt “pārūpād vyavacchinatti” tataḥ pṛthakkaroti tadasaṃkīrṇṇarūpatayā pratipadyate,
SA15n1236:648: paramārthatastasya tadrūpatvāt yathāvastu ca pratyakṣeṇa rūpānukārāt |
SA15n1236:651: tathā “tadanyadeva ca” tasmād dṛśyamānādanyadeva ca vyavacchinatti |
SA15n1236:658: yata evamataḥ “tad” eva pramāṇamekavastuparicchedakaṃ prakārāntarābhāvaṃ sādhayati,
SA15n1236:661: tasmiṃ dṛśyamāne vastuni dṛṣṭatadanyatvena tasyānyasya tatrāparicchidyamānasyānyatvaṃ tadanyatvaṃ dṛṣṭāt tadanyatvaṃ “dṛṣṭatadanyatvaṃ” tena sarvvasya tavdyatiriktasya vyavasthāpanānna a(panena a)
SA15n1236:662: tadanyasyaiva ca yadanyanna bhavati puro'vasthitaṃ sakalaparabhāvavyāvṛttaṃ tasyaiva tattvena dṛśyamānaprakāratayā vyavasthāpanāditi |
SA15n1236:664: etena anantaroktena nyāyena pratiniyataikapadārtharūpānukāriṇī buddhirupajāyamānā tadviparītarūpaṃ sarvvaṃ svaviṣayād vyavacchindatī dvairāśyaṃ tṛtīyaprakārābhāvaṃ ca sādhayatīti ye kecidanyonyavyacchedarūpāḥ kramākramanityānityādayaḥ te vyākhyātāḥ |
SA15n1236:665: tathā hi-kāryasya kramamananyasahāyatāṃ pratiyatyeva buddhistasyākramaṃ kāryāntarasāhityaṃ tataḥ pṛthakkaroti |
SA15n1236:666: tataḥ kramākramatayā dvaitasiddheḥ tṛtīyasya prakārasya sambhavo nirasto bhavati |
SA15n1236:668: evamudayānantaradhvaṃsitā kṣaṇikatocyate iti pratīyatī vyavasthāpanākāla eva buddhistadviparītarūpatāyāḥ svaviṣayādapākaraṇāt tato'nyatvena prakārāntare'vasthāpanād rāśyantarābhāva iti |
SA15n1236:669: tadevamekapramāṇanibandhanāmasāṅkaryasiddhiṃ pratipādyopasaṃharannāha- “tadevam” uktena nyāyena “ekasya” pratiniyatātmana upalambhāt tasyopalabhyamānasya yastato'nyastattulyayogyatārūpastavdiparīto vā tadrūpavikalastadātmano “vyavacchedaḥ” pṛthakkaraṇaṃ tasyopalabhyamānasyānupalabhyamānasvabhāvād rūpāntareṇa pratibhāsanāt |
SA15n1236:670: tathā tasya svaviṣayasya tadanyātmatāyā bhāvapradhānatvānnirddeśasya “vyavacchedo bhavati” asāṅkaryaṃ sidhyati |
SA15n1236:671: tad yadyetadaviśeṣeṇānyasya sarvvasya tannābhāvasiddhiḥ syādityatrābhimataṃ tadā siddhasādhanam,
SA15n1236:672: yataḥ sarvvamaviśeṣeṇaiva tadekākārayā budhyā tadrūpavikalaṃ svaviṣayādavacchidyate,
SA15n1236:674: atha taddeśakālayorabhāvaḥ sarvvasya tadviparītarūpasya vyavacchedo'bhimataḥ sa na yukta iti darśayati-“na taddeśakālayoḥ” yatrāsau pratiniyatātmā sakalatrailokyavilakṣaṇaḥ padārtha upalabhyate tatra sarvvasyānyasya bhāvasya tattulyayogyatārūpasyetarasya vā vyavacchedaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ |
SA15n1236:675: yena hi kāraṇena tattulyayogyatārūpasya tatrāpratibhāsamānasya pratiṣedhastasmin sati tadekarūpaniyatāyāḥ pratipatterasaṃbhavāt tadabhāvanāntarīyikā sā bhāvantī tatpratiṣedhaṃ gamayatīti tatkāraṇamanupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpte tadatulyayogyatārūpe ca na sambhavatīti kathaṃ tadabhāvaḥ sidhyet |
SA15n1236:676: etadevopasaṃharannāha-“tasmādatadātmā” ca sarvvastadviparītarūpastadekākārayā buddhyā prasādhitaḥ syāt “taddeśakālaśca” tasya pratibhāsamānasya yau deśakālau tau yasya, sa ca syāt |
SA15n1236:679: nahi rūpapratibhāsinā jñānena tadrūpavikalasya rasasya svaviṣayāt pṛthakkaraṇe'pi tadasāṃkaryasādhane'pi taddeśakālayorabhāvaḥ sidhyati |
SA15n1236:688: tadevaṃ prāsaṅgikaṃ parisamāpayya yaduktaṃ pareṇa ‘sa evānyabhāvastadviṣayā copalabdhiḥ tadabhāvasya kiṃ na sādhanam’ iti tatrānyabhāvasya tadabhāvaṃ prati liṅgatve niraste tadviṣayāyā upalabdhernirākurvvannāha-“anyābhāvaviṣaye”tyādi |
SA15n1236:689: yatpunaruktam- ‘anyabhāvaviṣayopalabdhistadabhāvasya kinna sādhanam’ iti sā tadabhāvasya sādhikeṣṭaivāsmākam,
SA15n1236:692: yataḥ tatrāpyanyabhāvaviṣayāyāmupalabdhāva'bhāvasya pṛthaganyabhāvāt sādhyatve kalpyamāne sambandhābhāvasya tadabhāvena tulyatvāt |
SA15n1236:693: na hi tasyā api anyabhāvarūpāyāḥ tadabhāvena kaścidekārthasamavāyādirūpaḥ sambandho'stīti |
SA15n1236:695: yeyamanyabhāvaviṣayā upalabdhirlliṅgatayocyate tasyāstadviviktapradeśākārāyā “avirbhāvakāla eva” janmakāle pratītikāla eva vā tadabhāvasiddheśca |
SA15n1236:697: tadeva sādhayati-na hyanyasya tadviviktasya bhāvaṃ pratipadya pratipattā punaruttarakālaṃ tatpratipatteranyabhāvapratipattestadabhāvenānvayavyatirekau prasādhya pratibandhasādhakena pramāṇena tadabhāvaṃ pratipadyate |
SA15n1236:699: tadanyaṃ tadviviktarūpaṃ pratipadyamāna eva tasya pratiyogino'bhāvaṃ pratipadyate,
SA15n1236:702: nahi ‘ghaṭo'tra nāsti’ ‘ghaṭavānayaṃ na bhavati’ ‘saghaṭādanyaḥ’ ityarthabhedaḥ kaścit |
SA15n1236:706: darśanānantaramanvayavyatirekasādhanalakṣaṇena vyavadhānena vinā ‘idaṃ ghaṭaviviktaṃ pradeśavastvasti’ ‘idaṃ tu ghaṭavastu nāsti’ iti pāścātyena vikalpadvayena vyavasthāpanāt |
SA15n1236:714: atha tadviviktopalabdhisāmānyaṃ heturūcyate-yatra yatra ghaṭaviviktabhūtalopalabdhistatra tatra ghaṭābhāvo yathā pūrvvānubhūte ghaṭavivikte pradeśa ityāha- “sāmānyena pradarśane kriyamāṇe” dṛṣṭānte'pi pūrvvānubhūtaghaṭavivikte pradeśe ghaṭābhāvasya prasādhakaṃ pratyakṣādikaṃ pramāṇāntaramanyabhāvaviṣayopalabdhernāsti,
SA15n1236:715: kiṃ tu saiva tadanyabhāvopalabdhiḥ sādhyadharmmasya tadabhāvalakṣaṇasya sādhikā |
SA15n1236:716: sā ca yathā sādhyadharmmiṇi tadabhāvasiddhye dṛṣṭāntamapekṣate tathā dṛṣṭānte'pi |
SA15n1236:727: yastvamūḍho viṣayapratipattau viṣayiṇaṃ smaratyeva tasyābhāvavyavahāraḥ pratyakṣanibandhana eveti na tatrānupalabdherliṅgateti sucarccitamevānyatretīhālaṃ prasaṅgeneti |
SA15n1236:731: siddhe tatprasādhakena pramāṇena kāryakāraṇabhāve sati kāraṇasyānupalabdhiḥ |
SA15n1236:734: tathā, vyāpyavyāpakabhāvasiddhau satyāṃ tatprasādhanapramāṇabalenaiva siddhābhāvasyaiva vyāpakasya nānyasya vyāpakānupalabdherevāsiddhatāprasaṅgād |
SA15n1236:737: kathaṃ punaḥ kāraṇavyāpakayorabhāvavyavahāraḥ sidhyati yatastayoḥ siddhābhāvatocyata ityāha- “tatra kāraṇavyāpakayorapi” na kevalaṃ yasya sākṣādabhāvavyavahāraḥ sādhyate |
SA15n1236:742: atha kiṃ svabhāvānupalabdhāvapyabhāvo liṅgatayā sādhyata ityāha- “svabhāvānupalabdhau tu” ityādi |
SA15n1236:745: atra parasya vacanāvakāśamāśaṅkayāha- “yadi” tarhi “kāraṇavyāpakau” siddho'savdyavahāro yayoḥ tau santau |
SA15n1236:748: anyasya kāryasya vyāpyasya vā'bhāvamabhāvavyavahāraṃ ca sādhayataḥ |
SA15n1236:749: sā cānyabhāvopalabdhistayoḥ kāraṇavyāpakayorupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptāveva satyāmasavdyavahārasya sādhikā nānyathā ityevamiṣyamāṇe sati kathaṃ tayoḥ kāraṇavyāpakānupalabdhyoḥ parokṣe'rthe viṣaye prayogaḥ |
SA15n1236:750: yadā kāryasvabhāvahetvorvyatirekaprayogaḥ kriyate-yatra yatrāgnirnāsti tatra tatra dhūmo'pi nāsti,
SA15n1236:751: tathā yatra yatra vṛkṣo nāsti kṣaṇikatā vā tatra tatra śiṃśapā nāsti sattvaṃ vā ityaśeṣapadārthaparigraheṇa vyatirekaprayoge sati |
SA15n1236:754: tataśca kathaṃ tadviviktopalabdhilakṣaṇānupalabdhiḥ pratiyogino vopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatā siddhā ? |
SA15n1236:755: tathā ca kathamaśeṣopasaṃhāreṇa vyāptyā kāryasvabhāvahetvo'rvyatirekaḥ sidhyet ? |
SA15n1236:760: siddhāntavādyāha- “naiva” parokṣe'rthe kāraṇavyāpakānupalabdhyoḥ “prayogo” vyatirekopadarśanakāle “pramāṇatayā” kāraṇasya vyāpakasya vā'nupalabdhiḥ pramāṇabhūtā naiva prayujyate |
SA15n1236:762: “liṅgasya” kāraṇavyāpakānupalabdhilakṣaṇasya tadabhāvalakṣaṇasya vā “aniścayāt” tadanupalabdhyoḥ sandeharūpatvāt tadabhāvasya ca sandigdhatvāt |
SA15n1236:765: kāraṇavyāpakayorhikāryakāraṇabhāvaprasādhakena pūrvvoktena pramāṇena vyāpyavyāpakabhāvasādhakena ca tadutpattilakṣaṇe tādātmyalakṣaṇe ca sambandhe sādhite siddhasambandhayoryadyabhāvo yatra yatrā bhāvaḥ syāt parasyāpi kāryasya vyāpyasya vā'vaśyaṃ niyamenābhāvo'nyathā'hetukatvaprasaṅgāt,
SA15n1236:767: taddvāreṇa pratibandhaprasādhake pramāṇe smṛtiḥ kathaṃ nāma syādityetasyārthasya darśanārthamete kāraṇavyāpakānupalabdhī prayujyete iti |
SA15n1236:768: darśanādarśanabalena tu sādhane yatraivaikadarśane paro dṛṣṭo'darśane vā na dṛṣṭaḥ tatraiva tasya bhāvo'bhāvo vā bhavatu sarvvatra tu kasmād bhavati ? |
SA15n1236:769: na hyapratibaddhātmanāṃ gavāśvādīnāṃ kvacit tathābhāvadarśane'pi sarvvatra tathābhāvo bhavati,
SA15n1236:770: puruṣasya tu sarvvadā kvacidekabhāvābhāvayoraparasya bhāvābhāvādarśanaṃ yadṛcchāsaṃvādaḥ sambhāvyeta asati pratibandhe | tathā cāha-
SA15n1236:775: na cāsau vyāptyā'nvayavyatirekopadarśanamantareṇa khyāpayituṃ śakyata iti ‘yatra yatra’ iti sakalapadārthaparigraheṇa khyāpyate |
SA15n1236:776: pratibandhe hi pramāṇasiddhe satyavaśyameva yatra yatra kāryaṃ tatra tatra kāraṇam,
SA15n1236:777: yatra yatra tadabhāvaḥ tatra tatra ca kāryasyāpyabhāvo'nyathā kāraṇamantareṇa kāryasya bhāve tasyāhetutaiva syāt |
SA15n1236:779: tathā yatra yatra yatsvabhāvastatra tatra tadbhāvaḥ anyathā tasya nairātmyameva syāditi vyāptyaivānvayavyatirekopadarśane pratibandhaḥ khyāpayituṃ śakyate nānyatheti prāgeva vistarato vipañcitam |
SA15n1236:781: evaṃ kāryasvabhāvānupalabdhilakṣaṇe eva pakṣadharmme tatsādhakapramāṇasabhdāvādanvayavyatirekasabhdāvo nānyatreti pratipādyopasaṃharannāha-“iti” eṣa eva svabhāvakāryānupalabdhilakṣaṇaḥ pakṣadharmmo'nvayavyatirekavān pratibandhasabhdāvāt |
SA15n1236:782: yataśvānvayavyatirekavān pratibandhaprasādhakapramāṇasabhdāvāduktena nyāyena “iti” tasmāt “tadaṃśena vyāpto”'nvayavyatirekaniścayenaiva tadaṃśavyāpterniścayād yathoktaṃ prāk,
SA15n1236:783: tataśca tadaṃśavyāptivacanāt trilakṣaṇa eva “trirūpa eva” trividha eva heturggamako nānyalakṣaṇo'nyo vā yathoktatrairūpyasabhdāve rūpāntarasya vaiyarthyāt yathoktatrairūpyābhāve ca rūpāntarakalpanāyāmapyavyabhicārābhāvenāgamakatvāt |
SA15n1236:784: kasmāt trilakṣaṇa eva trividha eva heturggamako nānyalakṣaṇo'nyo veti darśayati “svasādhyadharmmāvyabhicārād” iti trilakṣaṇasyaiva svasādhyadharmmāvyabhicārāt |
SA15n1236:785: svasādhyadharmmāvyabhicāra eva ca gamakatvamiti rūpāntarakalpanā vyarthā |
SA15n1236:787: tadanena ‘tridhaiva sa’ ityasya trilakṣaṇa eva “sa heturaḥvinābhāvasya” svasādhyadharmmāvyabhicārasya “niyamād” avaśyantayā sabhdāvāt pratibandhanimittatadaṃśavyāptyanabhyupage (game)
SA15n1236:788: ca rūpāntarakalpanāyāmapi “hetvābhāsāstato'pare” yathoktatrilakṣaṇādapare rūpāntarayogitayā vikalpyamānā hetvābhāsā avinābhāvasya svasādhyadharmmāvyabhicārasya teṣvabhāvādityaparo'rtho darśita iti |
SA15n1236:790: yaduktaṃ ‘trilakṣaṇa eva heturnānyalakṣaṇaḥ’ iti tatra pareṣāṃ vipratipattiṃ darśayannāha- “ṣaḍlakṣaṇo heturityapare” naiyāyika-mimāṃsakādayo manyante |
SA15n1236:794: abādhitaḥ pramāṇenānirākṛto viṣayaḥ sādhyadharmmalakṣaṇo yasya sa tathoktaḥ tasya bhāvaḥ tattvamaparaṃ rūpam |
SA15n1236:796: ekā saṃkhyā yasya hetudravyasya tadekasaṃkhyaṃ vivakṣitamekasaṃkhyaṃ hetudravyamāśrayatvena yasya hetusāmānyasya tadvivakṣitaikasaṃkhyaṃ tabhdāvo'paraṃ rūpam |
SA15n1236:797: yadyekasaṃkhyāvyāvacchinnāyāṃ pratiheturahitāyāṃ hetuvyaktau hetutvaṃ bhavati tadā gamakatvaṃ na tu pratihetusahitāyāmapi dvisaṃkhyāyuktāyāmiti |
SA15n1236:798: yadi viruddhāvyabhicāryaparaṃ hetvantaraṃ nopadarśyata iti yāvat |
SA15n1236:800: nahyajñāto hetuḥ svasattāmātreṇa gamako yuktaḥ iti |
SA15n1236:801: tatraiteṣu rūpāntareṣu yadetabādhitaviṣayatvaṃ nāma tat tāvat pratibandhanibandhanānvayavyatirekātmakā'vinābhāvasambhave sati tataḥ pṛthaganyallakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati |
SA15n1236:805: tathā hi-satyapyavinābhāve yathokte bādhāsambhavaṃ manyamānairabādhitaviṣayatvaṃ rūpāntaramucyate |
SA15n1236:809: satyeva hi sādhyadharmme bhāvo hetoravinābhāva ucyate |
SA15n1236:811: yadi hi satyeva tasmiṃstadabhāvaviṣayaṃ pramāṇaṃ pravartteta tadā'sya bhrāntatvādapramāṇataiva syāt iti kuto bādhā ? |
SA15n1236:813: atra ca sādhyadharmmaḥ kathaṃ na bhavet” ?
SA15n1236:815: tasmādavinābhāvasya pramāṇabādhāyāśca sahānavasthānamavinābhāvenopasthāpitasya dharmmiṇi sādhyadharmmabhāvasya pramāṇabādhopasthāpitasya ca tadabhāvasya parasparaparihārasthitilakṣaṇatayā virodhenaikatra dharmmiṇyasambhavāditi |
SA15n1236:816: tameva virodhaṃ spaṣṭīkartuṃ paropahāsavyājenāha- “pratyakṣānumāne hi” ityādi |
SA15n1236:819: tasmiṃśca sādhyadharmme satyeva tadavinābhāvitvāddheturbhavaṃ “staṃ” sādhyadharmmaṃ niṣkāsyamānaṃ gale gṛhītvā haṭhāt “tatraiva” dharmmiṇyavasthāpayatīti “paraṃ” prakṛṣṭaṃ bata “bhāvānāṃ” sādhyadharmmalakṣaṇānāmasvāsthyaṃ vartate |
SA15n1236:820: tathā hi- yantradvayaniyantritānāṃ nirucchāvasitayā maraṇameva prāptamiti |
SA15n1236:821: paro bādhā'vinābhāvayorvviṣayabhedādavirodhaṃ darśayannāha- “anyatra” sādhyadharmmiṇaṃ parihṛtya dṛṣṭāntadharmmiṇi sādhyadharmmeṇāvinābhāvī heturna punaḥ sādhyadharmmiṇyeva |
SA15n1236:822: tataḥ kuto bādhā'vinābhāvayorvvirodho'nyatra bādhayā sādhyadharmmābhāvasādhanādanyatra ca hetunā tabhdāvasādhanāt |
SA15n1236:823: tathā caivaṃvidhe satyapi avinābhāve bādhāsambhavād abādhitaviṣayatvasya rūpāntarasya sambhava iti |
SA15n1236:824: evaṃvidhāvinābhāvopagame satyapyabādhitaviṣayatvādike rūpāntare “hetvābhāsāstato'pare” rūpāntarasambhavina ityāpāditāṃ hetvābhāsatāṃ vivarītuṃ paropahāsapūrvvakamāha- tat kim “ayaṃ” sādhyadharmmī “tapasvī” varākaḥ “śaḍḍha(ṇḍha)
SA15n1236:825: mudvāhya tasmiṃn” sādhyadharmmasādhanaśaktivikalaṃ hetuṃ pariṇāyya sādhyadharmmalakṣaṇaṃ “putraṃ mṛgayate ?” |
SA15n1236:829: na hya'mbhastvasya samudre lavaṇatvenāvinābhāve'pi tavdyatirikte'mbhasi lavaṇatayā sādhyatveneṣṭe'mbhastvabhāve'pi lavaṇatvasiddhiriti |
SA15n1236:832: yata eva heturanyathā'pi sādhyadharmmamantareṇāpi dharmmiṇi bhavedambhastvādiṣu tathādarśanāt,
SA15n1236:833: sādhyadharmmiparihāreṇa cāvinābhāvopagamāt ata eva kāraṇāt pramāṇābhyāmabādhitadharmmā dharmmītyucyate |
SA15n1236:834: yadi pratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ sādhyadharmmiṇi hetorvviṣayaḥ sādhyadharmmo na bādhyate yathā'mbhastvasya lavaṇatvam,
SA15n1236:837: tato'nyatrāvinābhāvamātreṇa sādhyasiddheranabhyupagamāt na yathokto doṣa iti |
SA15n1236:838: siddhāntavādyāha- “tat kim” idānīṃ yadā hetordharmmiṇyavinābhāvitānabhyupagamāt sādhyasiddherabhāvāt tatsiddhaye rūpāntaramabādhitaviṣayatvamucyate tadā hetorna kiñcit sāmarthyam |
SA15n1236:840: tathā hyatra kalpanādvayam-bādhakapramāṇavṛttau sādhyābhāvo niyato vā syād ? aniyato vā ? |
SA15n1236:841: tatra yadi pūrvvo vikalpastadā sādhyābhāvo hi bādhakapramāṇasya vṛttau niyataḥ,
SA15n1236:843: tasmād “abādhāyāṃ” bādhakapramāṇavṛttyabhāve tanniyatasya sādhyābhāvasyāpyabhāvāt “sādhyasiddhiḥ” bhavatyeveti vyartha eva heturiti nopanyasanīya eva |
SA15n1236:845: syānmatam- mā bhud bādhakapramāṇavṛttyabhāve hetoḥ sāmarthyam,
SA15n1236:846: yadā tu sādhyasya bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ dharmmiṇi varttate tadā hetoḥ sādhyasādhane sāmarthyaṃ bhaviṣyatītyata āha- “bādhāyāmapi” iti |
SA15n1236:847: yadi bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ varttate tadā tena sādhyābhāvasya dharmmiṇi sādhanāt punarbrahmaṇāpi tabhdāvasya karttumaśakyatvāt kimaṅga punaḥ śaṭhena hetuneti kutaḥ sādhanasya hetoḥ sāmarthyam ? |
SA15n1236:848: ata eva hi bhavabhdirabādhitaviṣayatvaṃ rūpāntaramucyata iti |
SA15n1236:849: atha bādhakapramāṇavṛttau sādhyābhāvo na niyataḥ tadabhāve'pi bhāvāditi dvitīyaḥ pakṣa iṣyate tadāpyabādhāyāḥ sāmarthyaviraha iti darśayannāha- “aniyame” bādhakapramāṇavṛttau sādhyābhāvasyeṣyamāṇe satīdamāpatitam |
SA15n1236:850: na ca-bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ syāt “sādhyābhāvasya ca sambhavaḥ”- iti “na” sādhyasādhane “sāmarthyam abādhāyāḥ” satyāmapi tasyāṃ sādhyābhāvasya sambhavāditi tadyogino'pi hetvābhāsataiveti |
SA15n1236:851: yaduktam “abādhayaiva sādhyasiddhervyartho hetuḥ” iti tatrānyathā'rthamabādhāyā darśayan hetusāmarthyaṃ pratipādayannāha paraḥ-na bādhāyā abhāvo mamābādhā'bhimatā |
SA15n1236:854: sā ca tadanupalabdhiḥ puruṣasya śaktivaikalyāt kvacid deśādau bādhāyāḥ sambhave'pi syāt |
SA15n1236:855: tato bādhā'nupalabdhimātreṇa sādhyasiddherabhāvāt tatsiddhaye'vaśyaṃ heturabhidhānīya iti sa hetuprayogasya viṣayastadā hi hetuḥ svasādhyaṃ sādhayan kathamasamarthaḥ syāt ? iti |
SA15n1236:856: siddhāntavādyāha-kiṃ nu vai heturbbādhāyā yā upalabdhistasyāḥ vibheti na punarbbādhāyā yena bādhāṃ sambhavantīmapyanādṛtya tadanupalabdhau satyāṃ prayoktavya iṣṭo bhavataḥ |
SA15n1236:857: kadācit paro brūyāt-kiṃ kariṣyati vidyamānā'pi bādhā tapasvinī,
SA15n1236:859: tasmāt tata eva hetorbhayaṃ tadabhāve hetuḥ prayoktavya evetyata āha- “sa tarhi” ityādi |
SA15n1236:860: evaṃ tarhi paramārthena bādhā kimasti nāstītyetadanapekṣya bādhāyā anupalabdhau satyāṃ prayoktavya iti kākvā pṛcchati |
SA15n1236:864: paro'navagatābhiprāya āha-“sādhyasiddhyartham” iti bādhakapratyayābhāve pramāṇyasyeṣṭatvāt tataḥ sādhyasiddhiraviruddhaiveti manyate |
SA15n1236:865: siddhāntavādī satyāṃ bādhāyāṃ tadanupalambhe'pi sādhyasiddhimasambhāvayan pṛcchati “sa kiṃ kvacid” ityādi |
SA15n1236:866: kiṃ punarasau hetuḥ satyāmapi bādhāyāṃ sādhyaṃ sādhayediti sambhāvyate bhavatā yenāsyā bādhāyā abhāvaniścayaṃ prati yatno na kriyate hetuśca prayujyata iti |
SA15n1236:868: tathā satyāmapi bādhāyāṃ sādhyasādhanasāmarthopagame satyabādhitaviṣayatvaṃ hetulakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati |
SA15n1236:871: taddhi hetorlakṣaṇamucyate yena vinā sādhyaṃ na sādhayediti |
SA15n1236:874: evaṃ hi sati bādhāyāḥ sabhdāvasambhave'pi tāmabhyupagamya tadanupalambhamātreṇa hetoḥ prayogaḥ prāptaḥ |
SA15n1236:875: yadi hi bādhāmabhyupagamya hetuprayogo nābhimataḥ syāt tadā'nupalambhamātreṇa bādhāyaṃ saṃśayāt-satāmapi keṣāñcit kathañcidanupalambhasambhavāt-saṃśayitasya hetuprayoge pravṛttireva na yujyeta |
SA15n1236:876: tasmād yo yatsaṃśaye'pi pravartate sa tasya bhāvapakṣamabhyupetyaiva pravarttate |
SA15n1236:877: tathā ca yathā bādhānupalabdhau tāmabhyupagamya hetuḥ prayujyate tathā tadupalabdhāvapi prayujyatām,
SA15n1236:878: bādhāyāḥ sabhdāvābhyupagame sati tadupalambhānupalambhayorvviśeṣābhāvāditi nānupalabhyamānabādhatvamapi hetulakṣaṇaṃ yujyata iti kuto bādhakapratyayavirahe'pyasati pratibandhe prāmāṇyasya sambhava iti |
SA15n1236:880: naiva hi bādhāyāṃ saṃtyāṃ hetoḥ sāmarthyamiṣyate tat kathaṃ tadupalambhe'pi prayogaḥ syāt ? |
SA15n1236:881: siddhāntavādyāha- “yadyevaṃ” bādhāyāṃ satyāṃ heturasamartho yadīṣyate tadā'nirṇṇīto bādhāyā asaṃbhavo yasya hetoḥ sa tathāvidhaḥ prayogaṃ bādhā'nupalambhamātreṇa nārhati |
SA15n1236:883: mā bhūd bādhāyāḥ sambhavapakṣe “prayuktasyāpi” hetoḥ sādhyasiddhau “asāmarthyamiti” |
SA15n1236:884: pūrvvapakṣavādyāha-bādhānupalambhe sati bādhāyā abhāvāt sadupalambhakapratyayābhāve satyavaśyamarthānāmasattvāddhetoḥ sāmarthyam iti cenmanyase siddhāntavādyāha- “kimupalambho bādhām” ityādi |
SA15n1236:895: iti anenaiva nyāyena jñānanivṛttyā bādhānivṛtterityāha-ta-thāpi vyartho hetuḥ |
SA15n1236:900: tathā hi-yatra bādhāyā anupalambhastatra paramārthata eva sā na vidyata iti manyase |
SA15n1236:901: yatra cāsau paramārthato nāsti tatra sādhaydharmmasyābhāvo'pi paramārthenaiva nāstyanyathā paramārthena bādhāyā abhāvāyogāt |
SA15n1236:902: tataśca sādhyadharmmasyābhāvābhāve sati bhāva iti bhavanmatyā sādhyapratītervyarthatā hetoriti |
SA15n1236:903: atha mā bhūd yuktivirodha iti nopalambhanivṛttau bādhānivṛttiriṣyate,
SA15n1236:904: tatrāha- upalambhasya nivṛttāvapi satyāṃ bādhāyā anivṛttāviṣyamāṇāyāṃ tadavasthaṃ hetorasasāmarthyam yadavasthaṃ bādhopalambha iti hetoraprayoga iti kasyābādhitaviṣayatvaṃ rūpāntaraṃ syāt ? |
SA15n1236:906: yata evaṃ vyāptyā hetoḥ sarvvatra sādhyenāvinābhāvābhyupagame bahirvyāptāviṣyamāṇāyāṃ vaiyarthyaṃ hetuprayogasyāpadyate tasmāt “svasādhyabhāvābhāvābhyāṃ anyathā'pi” svasādhyabhāve'pyabhavanna'bhāve'pi ca bhavan heturdharmmiṇi kiñcit sādhyaṃ “na bhāvayati” na sādhayati “na vibhāvayati” tadviparītaṃ na niṣedhayati “iti” tasya vidhipratiṣedhāvakurvvata “upakṣepaḥ” prayogo “na samarthaḥ” ityavaśyaṃ hetuprayogamicchatā svasādhyāvinābhāvaḥ sarvvatra hetorabhyupagantavyaḥ |
SA15n1236:910: yata evaṃ tena kāraṇenābādhā rūpāntaraṃ na bhavati |
SA15n1236:911: yadi nāma bādhāvinābhāvayoḥ sahāvasthānābhāvādavinābhāve satyabādhā gamyate rūpāntaraṃ tu kimiti na bhavati ?
SA15n1236:914: lakṣaṇakāraiśca rūpāntaratvenopādānamarhati yasya viśeṣaṇasya bhāve'pi yasyāparasyābhāvaḥ syāt |
SA15n1236:915: yataḥ sambhave vyabhicāre ca viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo na sambhava eva kevale |
SA15n1236:917: satyapi hi dharmmisambandhe śrāvaṇatvādeḥ sapakṣe bhāvo nāsti |
SA15n1236:918: satyapi ca cākṣuṣatvādeḥ sapakṣe bhāve sādhyadharmmiṇi śabde sambandho nāsti |
SA15n1236:920: ihā'pyevaṃ bhaviṣyatīti ced āha- “na caitad” anantaroditamabādhāyā avinābhāve sati sambhavati |
SA15n1236:921: satyavinābhāve niyamenābādhāyāḥ sambhavāvdyabhicārābhāvāt kuto viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo kṣaṇāntaratvena copādānamarhati ?
SA15n1236:922: iti na hetoḥ sādhyāvinābhāvino viruddhasya ca sādhyaviparyayāvinābhāvino viṣaye bādhā sambhavati |
SA15n1236:923: uktena prakāreṇa viparyaye samyaggheturevāviṣaye tu prayogāddhetvābhāsa ucyate |
SA15n1236:924: yata evam “iti” tasmānna tadabhāvo bādhāvirahaḥ pṛthagavinābhāvādanvayavyatirekātmano'nayorhetuviruddhayorlakṣaṇāntaratvena vācyaḥ,
SA15n1236:926: yataścāvinābhāve sati bādhā na sambhavati virodhāt,
SA15n1236:927: tasmāddhetoryathoktalakṣaṇasya prayoge sati gamyārthāyā api pratijñāyā doṣāṇāṃ pratyakṣaviruddhādīnāṃ sambhavo nāsti,
SA15n1236:933: hetuprayoge hyasati kevalā pratijñaiva na prayujyate,
SA15n1236:935: tataśca śāstrakārairna pratijñādoṣāḥ pratyakṣaviruddhādayo vācyā iti |
SA15n1236:936: diṅnāgapādaistu sādhyāsādhyaviparyayeṇa vipratipattidarśanādaprayogārhasyāpi pakṣasya lakṣaṇavidhāne nyāyaprāptamevāpakṣatva na ni(tvaṃ ni)
SA15n1236:941: tadevamabādhitaviṣayatvaṃ nirākṛtya rūpāntaraṃ nirākurvvannāha- “etena” avinābhāve sati bādhāyā asambhavadarśanena “ekasaṃkhyāvivakṣā'pi” viruddhāvyabhicāridoṣavipakṣeṇocyamānā “pratyuktā” pratyākhyātā |
SA15n1236:942: paraḥ pṛcchati- “katham” iti kena prakāreṇa-yathā bādhāvinābhāvayoḥ sahānavasthānaṃ tathā pratihetvavinābhāvayorapi ?
SA15n1236:949: yatraiva dharmmiṇi sa tallakṣaṇa eko bhavati tatraiva dharmmiṇi tasmādanyo'pi pratiheturviruddhastena hetulakṣaṇayuktaḥ kathaṃ bhavati ? |
SA15n1236:950: ekasya hetoryat sādhyaṃ tabdādhakasya tadviruddhasyāparasya dharmmasya bhāva eva nābhāve bhāvādavinābhāvāditi bādhayā samānaṃ bādhāsambhavena samānaḥ pratiheturiti tannirāsenaiva nirasta iti |
SA15n1236:952: “vastutaḥ” paramārthato yasya pratiheturna sambhavati kimasau samyagjñānasya viparyasya vopanyastasādhyaviparītajñānasya vā heturiṣṭo yato vivakṣitaikasaṃkhyatvaṃ tallakṣaṇamucyate,
SA15n1236:953: āhosvid yasya pratihetustatsādhyaviparītasādhako na pradarśitaḥ paramārthataḥ sannapīti |
SA15n1236:955: yadi nāma purvvo vikalpa uttaro vā tataḥ ko doṣaḥ ? iti |
SA15n1236:959: aśakyo niścayo yasya vastuto'sambhavatpratihetutvasya sa tathoktaḥ |
SA15n1236:963: sa cānupalabhyamāno'pi kadācit syāditi vastutastadabhāvo niścīyate |
SA15n1236:965: nahi tādātmyatadutpattilakṣaṇe pratibandhe pramāṇataḥ siddhe tannimittāvinābhāvitayā ekena hetunā svasādhye sādhite punastatraiva dharmmiṇi tallakṣaṇasya tadviruddhārthasādhakasya pratihetoḥ sambhavaḥ śaṅkayate,
SA15n1236:968: viruddhadharmmasādhakasambhave ca tasyaiva svasādhyāvinābhāvinaḥ prathamasya tatra pramāṇato bhāvasiddhayayogāditi |
SA15n1236:969: syānmatam-yadi nāma prastutaḥ pratihetvasambhavo'smābhirniścetumaśakyastathāpyasambhavatpratihetutvaṃ vivakṣitaikasaṃkhyatvapratipāditaṃ hetulakṣaṇaṃ kasmānna bhavati ?
SA15n1236:971: pratipādako yo dharmmo hetostasyāniścitasvabhāvasya yasmāt tallakṣaṇatvaṃ pratipādakadharmmatā na bhavati |
SA15n1236:973: nāpi sandhigdhaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yasya sa heturbhavatīti na kaściddheturbhavediti hetvabhāvo vā ityasya samarthanam |
SA15n1236:975: syānmatam-yasya pratiyogī dṛśyate tasyaiva pratihetubhāvāt ahetutvaṃ bhavatu,
SA15n1236:976: yasya tu pratiyogī heturna dṛśyate sa vastuta evāsambhavatpratihetuḥ |
SA15n1236:977: na hi tatra vastutaḥ pratihetusambhavaḥ śaṅkayate,
SA15n1236:981: śaṅkayamānapratihetunā tulyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ darśanādarśanamātranimittāvinābhāvarūpaṃ yasya tasmin dṛṣṭaḥ pratiyoginaḥ pratihetorbbādhakasya sambhavaḥ sa yeṣāmapi tattulyalakṣaṇānāṃ pratiyogī na dṛśyate teṣvapi śaṅkāṃ pratihetusambhavaviṣayāmutpādayati |
SA15n1236:986: pruṣaśaktivaikalyādinā tu tadadarśanaṃ sambhāvyeteti kimucyate ‘nāśaṅkā niḥpra(ṣpra)māṇikā’ iti |
SA15n1236:987: atha viśeṣaḥ pratibandhalakṣaṇo'vinābhāvaniścāyako dṛṣṭapratihetoradṛṣṭapratiyogina iṣyate yataḥ pratiyogisambhavāśaṅkā'stamupaiti |
SA15n1236:988: tadā sati vā viśeṣe sa viśeṣo hetorlakṣaṇam |
SA15n1236:990: yatastato viśeṣāddheturekāntena niścayena nirastapratipakṣastathāvidhe dharmmiṇi pratihetvasambhavāt svasādhyaṃ niścāyayatīti |
SA15n1236:991: yastathāvidho na bhavati tadviśeṣavirahāt dṛṣṭapratihetuḥ so'tallakṣaṇo na hetuḥ syāt |
SA15n1236:995: yathoktāvinābhāvavacanenaiva tannivṛtterityāha- “tathā ca hetau” tadviśeṣayogini “pratihetvasambhave” sati “vyarthā” niṣprayojanā “ekasaṃkhyāvivakṣeti” |
SA15n1236:996: yathoktaviśeṣāṅgīkarane tallakṣaṇasya pratihetorasambhavāt kasyaikasaṃkhyāvivakṣayā vyavacchedaḥ kriyate ?
SA15n1236:999: vastuto'sambhavatpratihetutvasiddhaye ca pratibandhalakṣaṇe viśeṣe hetāviṣyamāṇe viruddhāvyabhicāryapi hetvābhāso na bhavati |
SA15n1236:1001: iti darśayannāha-“ataḥ” pratibandhalakṣaṇaviśeṣopagamāt “viruddhāvyabhicāriṇo hetvābhāsasya yallakṣaṇaṃ taddhīyeta” na sambhavet |
SA15n1236:1004: hetoryadātmīyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tadyuktayorhetvorekatra dharmmiṇi virodhena parasparaviruddhasādhyasādhakatvenopanipāte sati viruddhāvyabhicārīti viruddhāvyabhicāriṇo lakṣaṇam |
SA15n1236:1005: na ca tat pratibandhāṅgīkaraṇe sati sambhavati |
SA15n1236:1006: nahi tādātmyatadutpattibhyāṃ svasādhyapratībandhavatyekatra hetau kvaciddharmmiṇi saṃbhavati dvitīyastallakṣastatraiva hetuḥ sambhavet,
SA15n1236:1009: tadavyabhicāriṇo hetordvitīyasya tatra kutaḥ sambhavāvakāśa iti |
SA15n1236:1010: nanu yadi tathavidhāviśeṣasambhave sati viruddhāvyabhicārilakṣaṇaṃ hīyate,
SA15n1236:1013: tat kimuktaṃ hetvabhāvo vetyata āha- “na ca” naiva “tasya” viśeṣasya pratibandhalakṣaṇasya,
SA15n1236:1015: “svarūpaṃ” tādātmyatadutpattilakṣaṇaṃ nirddiśyate bhavadbhiḥ yathā'smābhirnirdiṣṭaṃ yadrūpaṃ “pratītya” pratipadya pratiyoginaḥ ambhavāsambhavāvutpaśyāmaḥ |
SA15n1236:1016: yatra sa viśeṣo nāsti tatra pratiyoginaḥ sambhavaḥ kalpita āgamāśraye'numāne |
SA15n1236:1017: yatra tvasti sa viśeṣo vastubalapravṛtte'numāne tatra pratiyogino'sambhava iti |
SA15n1236:1018: yata evaṃ tasmānnāstyeva bhavatāṃ sa viśeṣaḥ-bhavabhdirna jñāyata eva sa viśeṣa iti |
SA15n1236:1019: tasmāt sarvvatra yatrāpi pratiyogī na dṛśyate tatrāpi śaṅkayā pratiyogiviṣayayā bhavitavyam |
SA15n1236:1021: yasyāpi hi pratiheturdṛṣṭasyāpi prāk praityogidarśanāditareṇa sarvvakālamadṛṣṭapratiyoginā na kaścid viśeṣo lakṣyate yaddarśanājjñāyeta ‘atra pratiyogī sambhavati nyānyatra’ iti darśanādarśanamātranibandhanayoranvayavyatirekayoḥ sarvvatra samānatvāt |
SA15n1236:1022: tathāpi paścāttatra pratiyogī dṛṣṭa iti sarvvatra tattulyalakṣaṇe pratiyogisabhdāvaśaṅkā na nivarttata iti |
SA15n1236:1024: yeṣu tu puruṣāyuṣeṇāpi nopalabhyate teṣvasau nāstyeva |
SA15n1236:1028: yeṣāmapi hi pratihetuḥ sambhavati teṣāmapi naiva sarvvadā tasya pratihetorūpalabdhiḥ pratipattṝṇām |
SA15n1236:1032: pratiyogī na dṛśyate tatra tadāśaṅkākathaṃ kriyate ? | tathā cāha-
SA15n1236:1036: sa sarvvavyavahāreṣu saṃśayātmā kṣayaṃ vrajet ||” iti |
SA15n1236:1038: tathā hi kasyacideva pramātuḥ kuśāgrīyamateratiśayavatī prajñā pratihetūtprekṣiṇī dṛṣṭā'smābhiḥ yathā vedaprāmāṇyanirākartṛṣu [hetuṣu] saugataiḥ śiṣyaparamparayā kumārilotpādātprāgadṛṣṭapratiyogiṣūpanyasteṣu,
SA15n1236:1039: tenaiva prajñātiśayaśālinā pratihetava utprekṣitāḥ tatastaddarśanāt yāvajjīvaṃ adṛṣṭapratihetuṣvapi tadāśaṅkā na nivarttate |
SA15n1236:1042: na ca pratiyogisambhavamāśaṅkamānastannimittasaṃbhavāt ‘utprekṣeta hi’ ityādyākrośamātreṇa nivarttayituṃ śakyate |
SA15n1236:1043: tenāsya pratiyogyāśaṅkāpanodakṣamaṃ kiñcit kāraṇamabhidhānīyam yathā'smābhirabhihitaṃ ‘svabhāvahetorviparyeye bādhakapramāṇavaśāttādātmyaniścaye satyanvayavyatirekayostatra nirṇṇayaḥ;
SA15n1236:1045: yata evaṃ sarvvatra pratiyogyāśaṅkā na nivarttate bhavaddarśane tena kāraṇenāniścayaḥ pratiyoginaḥ sambhavāsambhavayoḥ ‘iha pratiyogī sambhavati iha tu na sambhavati’ ityevaṃrūpa iti |
SA15n1236:1046: tasmādvastuto'sambhavatpratihetutvaṃ yallakṣaṇaṃ hetoḥ tasyāniścitatvādekasaṃkhyāvivakṣāvādināṃ na kaściddhetuḥ syāt |
SA15n1236:1048: tadevaṃ ‘kiṃ yo vastuto'sambhavatpratihetuḥ sa samyagjñānaviparyayaheturiṣṭaḥ’ iti amuṃ vikalpaṃ nirākṛtya dvitīyaṃ vikalpaṃ nirācikīrṣurāha- “athāpradarśitapratihetuḥ” samyagjñānaviparyaheturiṣṭa iti sambandhaḥ |
SA15n1236:1049: ayaṃ ca pakṣaḥ kila diṅnāgācāryasyāpyabhimata iti para upadarśayannāha-“yathāha diṅnāgācāryaḥ” |
SA15n1236:1051: “śrāvaṇatvasya hi na kathañcivdyavacchedahetutvam” iti diṅnāgācāryeṇokte pareṇābhihitam- “yadā tarhi vaiyākaraṇaḥ śabdatvaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣaṃ nityamabhyupagacchati tadā'yaṃ śrāvaṇatvalakṣaṇaḥ pakṣadharmmaḥ hetureva syāt |
SA15n1236:1052: nityaḥ śabdaḥ śrāvaṇatvāt śabdatvavat” ityevaṃ pareṇokte satyācāryeṇoktam- “yadyatra śabdākhye dharmmiṇyanityatvahetuṃ kṛtakatvaprayatnānatarīyakatvādilakṣaṇaṃ kaścid vaiśeṣikādirna darśayet tadā'yamapradarśitapratiheturhetureva bhavet” iti |
SA15n1236:1053: tadevāmācāryapādaiḥ sākṣitve datte bhujamutkṣipya śāstrakāraḥ pūtkurvvannāha- “idamidānīm” ityādi |
SA15n1236:1057: tat kiṃ gurūn dūṣayāma uta nyāyamapyupekṣāmahe ityubhayamapyaśakyamiti “kaṣṭataraṃ vyasanaṃ kathaṃ nirvoḍhuṃ śakyeta ?” |
SA15n1236:1059: kaḥ punaratra doṣo yenedaṃ kaṣṭataramityāha-“sa tāvadayaṃ” śrāvaṇatvalakṣaṇo “heturvvastūni” śabdādīni svasādhyaṃ tattvaṃ nityatvaṃ “tatprakṛtīni” tadātmakāni “kṛtvā” tacchrāvaṇatvaṃ pramāṇaṃ yeṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ mīmāṃsakavaiyākaraṇādīnāṃ tān “abhyudayena” svarggeṇa “niḥśreyasena” cāpavarggeṇa “yojayitvā” |
SA15n1236:1060: tathā hi- vastutattvaṃ bhāvayan yāvat kleśānn prajahāti tāvat svargamāsādayati,
SA15n1236:1062: athāvā śabdanityatvapratītau vedaprāmāṇyāt tadvihitāgnihotrānuṣṭhānāt svarggo vedāntaniṣevaṇādaparvaggaḥ |
SA15n1236:1063: punaruttarakālaṃ “pratibhāvatā” prajñājātīyena vaiśeṣikādinā puruṣeṇa “hetvantarasya” pratihetoḥ “nidarśanena” yadasya “nityatvasādhanasāmarthyaṃ” pratihetvanupadarśane satyāsīt ttatadupadarśanena “utkīlitam” apanītamiti |
SA15n1236:1065: tāṃśca tatpramāṇakān puruṣān svarggāpavarggasampadaḥ pracyāvya śrāvaṇatvalakṣaṇo hetuḥ śaktivaikalyāt paritrātumaśakto bhraṣṭarājya ieva rājā tapovanaṃ gacchati svaireva duścaritairiti kimatra vayaṃ brūmaḥ ? |
SA15n1236:1067: yada hyapradarśitapratiheturheturheturiṣyate tadā puruṣapratibhākṛtaṃ sādhanatvamabhyupagataṃ bhavati |
SA15n1236:1068: tataśca vastuto na kiñcit sādhanamasādhanaṃ vā prāptam |
SA15n1236:1070: yadā tūpadarśyate tadā na sādhanamiti puruṣapratibhākṛtaṃ sādhanatvamāyātamiti |
SA15n1236:1071: api ca- apradarśitapratihetorhetorhetutve'ṅgikriyamāṇe vikalpadvayam- kiṃ paramārthato hetustaddharmmabhāvī,
SA15n1236:1073: tatrādyaṃ vikalpamadhikṛtyāha-“sa ca” heturyo'sau prathamaṃ upādīyate |
SA15n1236:1074: sa “yadi svabhāvata” eva “tasmin” sādhyadharmme “satyeva bhavati” ityevaṃśīlo'smadupavarṇṇitapratibandhopagamāt yadīṣyate “tadā kathamanyathā kriyeta” hetvantareṇātaddharmmabhāvī kathaṃ kriyeta? |
SA15n1236:1077: vastūnāṃ hetulakṣaṇānāṃ yaḥsvabhāvaḥ-‘satyameva sādhyadharmme bhavanātmakaḥ’-“tadanyathābhāvasya” tadviparyayasya “abhāvād” ubhayośca svasādhyadharmāvinābhāvitve svabhāvata eva dharmmiṇyekatra tayorbhāve viruddhāvubhau svabhāvāvekasya syātām |
SA15n1236:1080: atha dvitīyo vikalpastadā “ataddharmmabhāvī ca” asatyapi sādhyadharmme bhavanaśīlaḥ pratibandhānabhyupagamāt “kathamanyadā'pi” apradarśitapratihetvavasthāyāmapi “sādhanaṃ” kasyacit ? |
SA15n1236:1084: yata evaṃ bhāvānāṃ svabhāvo'nyathā kartuṃ na śakyate,
SA15n1236:1085: viruddhobhayasvabhāvaścaiko na sambhavati tasmāt paramārthataḥ svena svena sādhyenāvinābhāvinoryathoktalakṣaṇayoḥ kāryasvabhāvahetvoḥ tallakṣaṇasya kāryasvabhāvalakṣaṇasya pratihetorasambhavād “alakṣaṇamekasaṃkhyāvivakṣā” vivakṣitaikasaṃkhyatvaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati |
SA15n1236:1089: sa ca pratihetuḥ svalakṣaṇayuktayoḥ kāryasvabhāvayornna bhavatyeveti kathaṃ taddhetulakṣaṇaṃ syāditi |
SA15n1236:1090: tadevamanayordvayo rūpayoryaḥ sambhavo yathoktāvinābhāvā'sambhave satīti rūpāntaropagame'pi hetvābhāsataiveti “hetvābhāsāstato'pare iti” ityasyārtho vivṛta iti |
SA15n1236:1092: avādhitaviṣayatvaṃ vivakṣitaikasaṃkhyatvaṃ ca kārya-svabhāvahetvorevāvinābhāve sati bādhāpratihetvorasambhavāt vyavacchedyābhāvatvena satyapi liṅgadharmmatve tallakṣaṇaṃ na bhavatītyuktam |
SA15n1236:1098: na ca tat liṅgasyātmarūpamiti kathaṃ liṅgalakṣaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati ? |
SA15n1236:1099: yadyapi vikalpapratibhāsī sāmānyākāro liṅgatayā'vasthāpyate tathāpi na jñānasya liṅgadharmmatā |
SA15n1236:1103: sādhyasādhanasaṃkalpe vastudarśanahāneḥ svalakṣaṇasya kvacidananvayācca taddharmmatāmeva tvanusmaranto vikalpā nānaikavyatirekān saṃdarśayanto vastuni paramparayā pratibandhādavisaṃvādakāḥ kāryādiliṅgavyapadeśanibandhanaṃ cetyuktaprāyam |
SA15n1236:1108: yasmādabādhyasyāpi bāhyatayā vyavasitasyānanuyāyino'pyanuyāyitayā sāmānyātmakatvaṃ tathātve cāsya vikalparūpatā kutaḥ ? yadā''ha-
SA15n1236:1113: kimātmakāt “hetoranumeyo'rtho jñātavyaḥ iti cintāyāṃ” prakṛtāyāṃ “pratipattuḥ” puṃso yadavisaṃvādakaṃ liṅgaṃ tasya svarūpamabhidhīyate śāstrakāraiḥ yasya rūpasya darśanādayaṃ pratipattā ‘yatra tadrūpasambhavaḥ tat sādhanam tadrūpavikalamasādhanam’ iti pravibhāgena vyavasthāpya yattatra sādhanatvena vyavasthāpitaṃ tasyeṣṭārthasannidhānasampratyayāt pravṛttimavalambate |
SA15n1236:1114: tathā, etasmiṃśca nyāye vyavasthite yadasya liṅgasyātmarūpaṃ tallakṣaṇaṃ bhavitumarhati pakṣadharmmādivat na tu yat pararūpam |
SA15n1236:1115: syādetat-jñātasya liṅgasya sādhakatvād yuktaiva sādhyasiddhyupayogino jñānasya liṅgalakṣaṇatetyata āha- “pratipattijanmani” ityādi |
SA15n1236:1116: yadyanumeyapratītijanmanyupayujyate jñānamiti tanmātreṇa liṅgasya lakṣaṇamiṣyate tadā'tiprasaṅgaḥ prāpnoti |
SA15n1236:1117: tamevāha- “evaṃ pratipattijanmanyupayogamātrālliṅgalakṣaṇatve prameyasya” arthasya “puruṣasya” pramātuḥ “ādi” śabdāt saṃyogasamavāyādīnāmālokamanaskārādīnāṃ liṅgalakṣaṇatvaṃ bhavet |
SA15n1236:1118: atra kāraṇamāha- “nahi teṣvapi” prameyādiṣu asatsu liṅgini jñānaṃ bhavatīti kṛtvā |
SA15n1236:1120: yadi pararūpatvājjñānaṃ liṅgalakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati tadā ca yadetadācāryeṇa-
SA15n1236:1126: jñānaṃ kimiti neṣyate yato niścayo vijñānameva tadviśeṣatvādasyeti |
SA15n1236:1127: siddhāntavādyāha- “na na karttavyaṃ” kintu kartavyameva tasya niścitagrahaṇasya liṅgarūpapratipādanyārthatvāt |
SA15n1236:1129: pare hi sapakṣe darśanamātreṇāsapakṣe cādarśanamātrato gamakaṃ hetumicchanti |
SA15n1236:1130: teṣāṃ naiva darśanamātreṇa sādhyasiddhau samartho heturbhavatīti jñāpanārthaṃ niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam |
SA15n1236:1133: yata evaṃ tena kāraṇena sapakṣe bhāvena vipakṣe sarvvatrābhāvaviśiṣṭenā'sapakṣe ca sarvvatrābhāvena sapakṣe tādātmyatadutpattilakṣaṇabhāvaviśiṣṭena gamako heturityasyārthasya jñāpanārthaṃ lakṣaṇavākye niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ boddhavyam |
SA15n1236:1134: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yāveva sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ bhāvābhāvau pratibandhasādhakapramāṇavṛttyā niścitau tābhyāmeva heturgamako bhavati,
SA15n1236:1135: na tu yathākathañciddarśanamātreṇetyasyārthasya jñāpanāya niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtamiti |
SA15n1236:1140: tena pararūpaṃ liṅgasya lakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati |
SA15n1236:1141: yataḥ tena jñānādinā pararūpeṇa liṅgasya na kaścid rūpaviśeṣo'bhidhīyata iti |
SA15n1236:1142: nanu ca pare'pi sapakṣavipakṣayorbhāvābhāvābhyāṃ gamakaṃ hetumicchanti,
SA15n1236:1146: yadyapi pare bhāvābhāvābhyāmeva gamakaṃ hetumicchanti tathāpi sapakṣa eva bhāvo'sapakṣe cābhāva eveti bhāvābhāvau darśanādarśanamātrato vyavasthāpayanti |
SA15n1236:1149: tasmād yau ‘hetoḥ sapakṣe eva bhāvo'sapakṣe cābhāva eva’ ityevamātmakau bhāvābhāvau tau tabhdāvasya sādhakaṃ yat pramāṇaṃ tādātmyatadutpattisādhanaviṣayaṃ taddhṛttyā voddhavyau |
SA15n1236:1151: tadanabhyupagame hi hetoḥ sapakṣa eva bhāvaḥ sarvveṣāṃ hetumatāṃ bhāvānāṃ sādhyenānugamadarśane sati vipakṣe cābhāva eva sādhyavikalānāṃ sarvvārthānāṃ hetuviviktānāṃ upalambhe sati syāt |
SA15n1236:1153: yata upāyāntaraṃ nāsti tena kāraṇena tayorvviśiṣṭayorbhāvābhāvayoḥ pratipādanāya niścitaśabdaḥ prayukto lakṣaṇe lakṣaṇakāreṇeti |
SA15n1236:1154: nanu ca bhāvābhāvavacanamātrādeva pramāṇato niścayo labhyate anyathā tayoreva sattā na prasidhyediti,
SA15n1236:1157: ityanenaiva sapakṣāsapakṣayoḥ bhāvābhāvavacanamātreṇā niścitagrahaṇanirapekṣeṇa tayorbhāvābhāvayoryat sādhanaṃ pramāṇaṃ tasya vṛttiryadyapyākṣipyate |
SA15n1236:1160: tadā “tayoreva” sapakṣavipakṣayoreva bhāvābhāvayoryā sattā svarūpavyavasthā tasyā “aprasiddheḥ” |
SA15n1236:1162: ityāha-“jñānasya” upalabdheryā sattā utpattiḥ tannibandhanatvājjñeyasya bhāvābhāvalakṣaṇasya sattāvyavasthāyāḥ svarūpavyavasthiteḥ |
SA15n1236:1166: yata evaṃ tasmāt sarvvatra śāstre loke vā jñeyasattāvyavasthaiva niścitagrahaṇaṃ vinā'pi “tatsādhanaṃ” tatsattāsādhanaṃ pramāṇam “ākarṣati” ākṣipatīti |
SA15n1236:1167: kiñca, parārthatvācca śāstrapraṇayanasya tatsādhanapramāṇavṛttirākṣipyate iti sambandhaḥ |
SA15n1236:1168: kīdṛśaṃ punastacchāstrapraṇayanaṃ yat parārtharūpatayā svavyavasthāpitajñeyasattāsādhanaṃ pramāṇamākṣipati ?
SA15n1236:1169: ityāha- “ trirūpaṃ liṅgaṃ vaḥ saṃvādakaṃ prāpakaṃ” vāñchitasyārthasyeti |
SA15n1236:1170: yadi nāmaivaṃrūpaṃ parārthaṃ śāstrapraṇayanaṃ tathāpi kathaṃ tat sādhanapramāṇavṛttimākṣipatītyāha- “tadrūpaṃ” tasya liṅgasya trirūpasya rūpaṃ svabhāvaṃ śāstroktaṃ ye pratipattāro na vidanti,
SA15n1236:1173: yata evam “iti” tasmāt paropalakṣaṇatvādeva pareṣāṃ jñāpakatvādeva pravarttake trirūpaliṅge jñānaṃ siddhamiti yadyapi niścitagrahaṇamatiricyate tathāpi tāveva liṅgasya sapakṣāsapakṣayorbhāvābhāvau viśiṣṭau śāstroktau ‘sapakṣa eva bhāvo'sapakṣe cābhāva eva’ ityevaṃrūpau kecinnaiyāyikaprabhṛtayaḥ,
SA15n1236:1174: pare darśanādarśanamātreṇa- ye darśanādarśane pratibandhasādhake na bhavataḥ- tanmātreṇa vyavasthāpayanti “yata eva iti” tasmātteṣāṃ vādināṃ niṣedhārtho'yaṃ lakṣaṇe niścitaśabdaḥ prayukta ācāryeṇāsmābhiścābhyupagata iti |
SA15n1236:1175: yadi tu paravipratipattiḥ na syāt tadā naivāsau prayujyeteti |
SA15n1236:1176: kimiti punarddarśanādarśanābhyāṃ bhāvābhāvaviṣayābhyāṃ sapakṣā [sa]pakṣayoḥ viśiṣṭau bhāvābhāvāvanvayavyatirekātmakau neṣyete ityāha- “satorapi” ityādi |
SA15n1236:1177: satyapi kvacit sapakṣe bhāvadarśane hetoḥ kvaciccāsapakṣe'bhāvadarśane ‘sa śyāmaḥ,
SA15n1236:1179: tathā hi- anvayo nāma sarvvatra satyeva sādhye hetorbhāvo vyāptyā cāsati sādhye hetorabhāvo vyatirekaḥ |
SA15n1236:1180: na ca kvacit sati sādhye hetorbhāvadarśane'pi tanmātreṇa tathābhāvaḥ sarvvatra bhavati,
SA15n1236:1182: tathā kvacit sādhyābhimatasyābhāve satyabhāvadarśane'pi hetoḥ sarvvatra tadabhāve'vaśyamabhāvaḥ,
SA15n1236:1184: tasmāt pratibandhaprasādhakapramāṇavṛttyaiva yathoktau sapakṣāsapakṣayoḥ bhāvābhāvau sidhyataḥ nānyatheti vipratipattinirāsārthameva niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtamityupadarśayannāha- “tasmāt” ityādi |
SA15n1236:1187: asatyāṃ tu vipratipattau tanna kartavyameveti pratipādya ata eva nyāyāt jñātatvaṃ rūpāntaraṃ na bhavatīti darśayannāha- “yato'pi”ityādi |
SA15n1236:1191: yathā pakṣadharmmatvavacanenaiva hetorupanayasyārtho'vagatastasya dharmmiṇi hetoḥ sabhdāvapradarśanātmakatvāt,
SA15n1236:1192: pakṣadharmmavacanasya ca tadrūpatvāt tataḥ pṛthagupanayo rūpāntaraṃ na bhavati;
SA15n1236:1196: yadi trairūpyavacanenaiva sāmarthyājjñānaṃ labhyata iti tat tataḥ pṛthag na vaktavyam “hantaḥ” tarhi anvayāt pṛthag vyatireko na vaktavyaḥ vyatirekācca pṛthaganvayaḥ |
SA15n1236:1200: tathā jñātatvasyāpi trairūpyād gamyamānasyāpi pṛthagvacanaṃ karttavyamiti |
SA15n1236:1204: tathā hi-anvayo hetoḥ sapakṣe bhāva ucyate,
SA15n1236:1206: na ca tau parasparamākṣipataḥ parasparamantarbhavato vidhipratiṣedharūpayorbhinnasvabhāvatvāt |
SA15n1236:1207: na ca yo yato bhinnasvabhāvaḥ sa tatrāntarbhūto yukto |
SA15n1236:1208: nanu ca yadyanvayavyatirekayorbhinnarūpatā kathaṃ tarhi trirūpaṃ liṅgamucyate ? |
SA15n1236:1212: yato yathā'nvayavyatirekau vyavasthāpyete na vā nayo (pyete tathā tayo)
SA15n1236:1217: vyāvṛttibhede'pi ca paramārthato bhedo nāstītyekaṃ liṅgaṃ trirūpamityucyate iti |
SA15n1236:1221: anvayamukhena vyatirekamukheṇa vā prayuktamekaṃ vākyamubhayamanvayaṃ vyatirekaṃ ca bhinnalakṣaṇameva gamayatītyucyate'smabhirnnaiko'rthaḥ svabhāvo dvitīyasyocyate,
SA15n1236:1223: atra para āha-“na tu tatraiva” ityādi |
SA15n1236:1226: tathā hi- ‘tatraiva bhāvaḥ’ ityatra lakṣaṇavākye tadarthatayā tadabhāve'bhāvo gamyate;
SA15n1236:1230: tataścaikenaiva sapakṣāsapakṣayorbhāvābhāvapratipādakena prativiśiṣṭena lakṣaṇavākyenobhayagaterdvitīyavacanaṃ na karttavyamiti |
SA15n1236:1232: tataśca yaduktam ‘anvayavyatirekayorapi tarhi na pṛthaktvamiti’ tat tadavasthameveti |
SA15n1236:1238: “niyamakhyāpakasya” ‘sapakṣa eva bhāvo'sapakṣe cābhāva eva’ iti sāvadhāraṇasya “dvitīyākṣepanāntarīyakatvāt” dvitīyapratipādananāntarīyakatvāt |
SA15n1236:1243: vaidharmyaprayoge ca sādharmmyavacanamiti na punarekābhidhānenānavagatasya rūpāntarasya pratipādanārtham |
SA15n1236:1244: na ca tathā trairūpyavacanena jñānanibandhanena jñeyasattāvyavasthāyāḥ propalakṣaṇārthena ca śāstrapraṇayanenāśritajñānasyaiva trairūpyasya pratipādanāllabdhasya jñānasya punarvvacane na kiñcit prayojanamastīti nāsya pṛthagvacanaṃ yuktamiti |
SA15n1236:1245: syānmatam-kevalāvapi tarhyekavākyārthānantarbhūtau parasparama'bhinnasvabhāvau bhaviṣyataḥ tata evaivakavākyārthāntarbhāvādityata āha- “na punaḥ kevalau” ekavākyārthānapekṣau tadantarbhāvamātreṇa sapakṣāsapakṣayoḥ bhāvābhāvau parasparamākṣipato'ntarbhavataḥ bhinnarūpāṇāmapyarthānāmekavākyāntarbhāvadarśanāt |
SA15n1236:1247: tayoḥ parasparākṣepe kevalayorapi tatprasaṅga ityata āha-“niyamavantau ca” sāvadhāraṇavākyapratipāditau “na kevalau” kintu sahitāveva |
SA15n1236:1250: tadevaṃ sāvadhāraṇena vākyena naiva kevalo'nvayo vyatireko vā'bhidhīyate |
SA15n1236:1251: tadantarbhāvāttu dvitīyagatiḥ kintu parasparāntarbhūtāveva sahitāvekena vākyenābhidhīyete iti pratipādyopasaṃharannāha-“tasmāt” tatraiva sapakṣa eva bhāva ityanena vākyena na sapakṣe bhāva evocyate |
SA15n1236:1254: tathā cetareṇāpyasapakṣe'bhāva eveti vacanena nābhāva eva kevala ucyate kintu sapakṣe bhāvo'pi,
SA15n1236:1255: yena kevalavacanena bhāvo'bhāvo vā tadātmakatayā dvitīyamākṣiped yato'nayoḥ pṛthagvacanaṃ na syāt |
SA15n1236:1256: tasmād yadā'nvayavyatirekau bhavābhāvāvabhipretau tadā tau bhinnarūpāveveti kathaṃ tayoḥ na pṛthaktvam ? |
SA15n1236:1257: atha niyamavatā vākyenābhihitau tadaikavākyādevobhayagateḥ pṛthagvacanaṃ na karttavyameva |
SA15n1236:1259: syānmatam-yathā'nvayavyatirekau bhāvābhāvalakṣaṇau na parasparātmakau tataśca tayoḥ parasparato rūpāntaratvam,
SA15n1236:1260: evaṃ paropalakṣaṇaśāstrapratipāditāt trailakṣaṇyād bhidyata eva jñānam,
SA15n1236:1267: trairūpyaviṣayāṃ pratītiṃ kāryante yena śāstreṇa tato yat trailakṣaṇyaṃ pratīyate āgṛhītajñānaṃ tasmādavyatirekādāgṛhītajñāne trailakṣaṇye'ntarbhāvāditi yāvat,
SA15n1236:1269: tadayamatra samudāyārthaḥ- yadi jñātatvaṃ jñānaśabdapravṛttinimittaṃ uktena prakāreṇa jñānamevocyate tadā talliṃgasyānātmabhūtamiti na tallakṣaṇam |
SA15n1236:1270: athāvi(pi) jñānāpekṣaḥ karmmabhāvo jñātatvamucyate tadā'pi jñeyasattāvyavasthāyā jñānasattānibandhanatvāt trairūpyavyavasthaiva tatsattāvyavasthāpakaṃ jñānamākṣipati |
SA15n1236:1271: tatastadapekṣo'pi karmmabhāvo'nuktasiddha iti na tadvacanaṃ pṛthakkarttavyam |
SA15n1236:1273: tadevamabādhitaviṣayatvādikaṃ rūpatrayaṃ nirākṛtya nigamayannāha- “tasmānna hetuḥ ṣaḍlakṣaṇaḥ |
